1.content:
after months, you finally manage to dominate the shrinking spell, as young archmage, that mostly mastered magic alone without going into a magic school you were a about to do what only happend in your dreams, shrink and going inside a pony, simple as that.

No fancy story, no real goals, just to revive your fantasy that only occur in nights and your morbid curiosity.

humankind and ponykind live together in equestria, under the rule of Princess Celestia and her reformed sister, Princess Luna, it like live in a real paradise. magic is in the air and is powerful tool for skilled unicorns and human mages like you and now you gonna use it to used to revive the experience that only happend in nights.

with 1 inch as your new size, you create a a portal that goes into a random site of equestria, you wonders where you going to end in this crazy and unusual journey.

You go into the portal, the other side was...
1.title: Fantasy comes True?

choices: Prince Shining Armor and Princess Cadence join in
11.content:
The portal took you to canterlot's palace!
the home of the Rulers Princess Celestia and Princess Luna themselves this could be fun specially entering in one of the rulers of the kingdom, with a levitation spell you hover (or better fly) high to explore the castle, it was huge compare to your size there were guards patroling everywhere luckily for your size and the ability to by magic spell you was able to hide and continue your journey undisturbed.

then it hit you, a delicious smell from the mess hall of the castle, it must be breakfast for the princesses, you quickly arrived to the mess hall, a great table locate in the center only to be ocuppied by only princess celestia and luna, both princesses seems to recently wake up.

for what you can say, you wake up pretty early yourself wanting to do this in the first place.

the princesses were demi-goddesses themselves but no true goddesses but now it look like true titans in this size of yours, they were eating eggs with slices of bread

this give you an idea to enter through their mouths while they are unaware of him
11.title: Canterlot's Palace

choices: Goes to swim in her acid, she can't harm you.
111.content:
You float toward celestia's food, she is using her magic to levitate her utensils, she looked so majectic, a titan compared to your tiny size, you were also admiring the food, landscape of vegetable and eggs fills your sigh, it was admirable in how magic can change your point of view of everything. you lifted with a piece of lettuce, her fork surrounded with golden aura, you hold youself, you could see passing how you pass her chest, her neck and now facing the voracious mouth of the princess of the sun.

you were amazed, in few second you along with lettuce piece, enter into her moist cavern, you fly inward avoiding being smashed by her teeths, you couldn't believe how warm her mouth was, her tongue has a pool of saliva, her teeth smashing the piece of lettuce where you were just few seconds ago, you sign in relief that you were on there, It seem that Celestia is unaware of you, you continue float toward her uvula seeing her throad and esophagus below. admiring the gateway that will begin your adventure.

suddenly something push you from behind, it was the piece of food that was now a ball covered with saliva, you make haste and descend toward her esophagus, the muscles welcome you as you push downward begin followed by the piece of food that swallowed the princess, soon you encounter the sphincter it was an enourmous gateway that goes into her spacious equine stomach, soon it opened, you fly entering into her spacious chamber.

You was amazed, below you could see the pool of acid already working at the food she already ate, the ball of letuce fall from the entrance you entered.

finally you were here.. in the stomach of princess celestia...
111.title: The Royal Mouth

choices: Decided to stay in stomach for a little more.
1113.content:
[[This Chapter and Arc is inspired by Komputer's Interactive story; Pokemon Endo Vore]]

"What we have here? a little intruder in my stomach." you hear an voice while floating in the organic chamber. it was... impossible! you thought.

"P-Princess?! but... but... how!?" you try to find a excuses but you soon shut up by the princess voice, oddily enough, she doens't sound angry or upset.

"You think that I don't heard or know about your plans do you?" you could heard the princess chuckling. she cought you from the very beginning but how? this is impossible! almost like she was actually...

"A Goddess? I am not but I'm closed, I can hear the wishes of all my subjects, include my humans subjects." you float arround the digestive organ pondering what to do or how to object the princess but it's probarbly futile, you land but notice something off, the acid is draining? there was a clear point to land, you feet connected to organic ground, feeling defeated, probarbly you will go to the dungeons of the castle for "intrusion". you sit down, suprisely there was a.. chair?

"Oh, what? princess, you devoured a chair?" you ask incredulously it was organic like the rest of the stomach of the solar princess.

"No, I made it for you" now you don't understand... she made the chair... with her own flesh.. in few seconds.

"Confuse? I soppused that you would give me a explanation young mage." she said a little more sternly, you sigh in defeat and start explaining why you shrunk and how you get here all was because your fantasies of being inside a pony, you didn't know that the portal you made would take to canterlot's palace and you thought that the princesses were... well.. no demi-goddesses.

"You like it?" She ask suddenly. confuse you ask "Pardon?"

"I asked if you like being inside of me." you love it you wanted to start exploring the princess unaware but now she know. you thought that she might throw you to the dungeon, you tell her that too, for your surprise, she softly laught in your mind.

"Why would I send you to the dungeons? I told you I hear the wish of my subjects, so I decided to made at least one reality, I felt your presence entering the palace amd in my mouth, at first I was shocked but until reading your mind I didn't mind at all, I used to hold a life with my body as a home." You got shocked at this revelation but how she do that? then again she answer that question for you "with magic I enchanted my own body allowing me to modify any organ within me, that's happend like 1500 years ago"

"that long?!" you ask

"Yes, it was when one of my subject, Star light, my once faithful student was mastering the shrinking and grow spell like you, but it ended badly when he, while stressed, ended shrinking himself and drinkin by accident an anti-magic potion, leaving him shrunk for months, he requested help from me and I did I ordered the royal apothecaries to search an antidote but I couldn't leave the poor Star wondering alone and in danger so.."

"... You allow him to live within you... that's... Incredible!" you finish her story

"Sort of, Star Light was quite terrified with the idea but he complied, after he growed back to his normal size he quitted"

"What?" you ask again

"He leaved my school of magic after that, no only he lost his ability to cast magic but he was scared for life to revive the experience" you couldn't believe it! this pony was the oposite of you in many ways? you notice that the stomach of the princess is opening various holes for you. you are a little startled but you calm as soon you hear the voice of the princess, she explain.

"So since you're in me, I let you explore my insides as you wish." she announce leaving you in front of these passages..

***

Celestia and Luna are in throne room, after the breakfast, Luna has been comenting about a presence entering to the castle and suggested to alert the guard just in case, Celestia, in the other hoof, told there was nothing to worried about, that she already founf the presence and dealt with him. Luna was confused when her sister said that but decided not to question her sister wisdom.

but she couldn't help but feel the very same presence inside of her sister's body.
1113.title: You hear... Celestia's Voice!

11131.content:
you rise up noticing that the chair disappear fusing with the flesh of the princess's organ. and you inspect each tunnel. each one lead you to one part of her body, to possibly to any organ of her, this was quite an honor, the princess is allowing you to explore her. this was quite suprising ana almost unbelievable but you a question for her.

"Eh, your highness?"

"Yes?"

"There are five tunnels yes, but, I don't know where they go." you ask, there was a few second of silence until the princess respond.

"How careless of me, my bad." each tunnels has now signs over them, you can read each of them.

Brain- This passage goes directly into the important part of my body you can visit here if you want to see my thoughs and memories

Eyes- This passage take you directly into my eyes if you want see the outside world from my perspective.

Heart- This is the second important part of my body, my heart where it pump my royal blood.

Intestine- This tunnels goes directly to second part of the digestive process, you will go directly to the small and large intestine then to the "backdoor", no pleasant experience.

Reproductive System- "The Royal Womb" where my foals are made... If it is someday I managed to have one.

"Well, is your choice now, Mage.
11131.title: You ask about the tunnels

111311.content:
"Your highness, I'm heading for your eyes first. Hope you won't mind me there."

"Very well, mage. I won't mind you looking at stuffs I see. In fact, your presence there is welcomed. My eyes should be a good starting point for your adventure," Celestia said telepathically, "If you have any questions, just speak with your mind and I'll be glad to answer them."

When the Princess fell silent again, you walked toward the desired passage and began ascending a series of steps. The stair is really squishy and bouncy; the whole place would jitter with every step you take. Princess Celestia has been really accommodating and you're thankful for that. This is maybe the first time a human gets to explore the interior of the solar princess, a very rare opportunity to fully understand her workings. You couldn't help but feel bad for Star Light being traumatized by such an experience. He sure missed out the fun part of being in a body, you thought.

Moments later, the stairs gave way to an chamber the size of a large bedroom that many of Canterlot's nobles own. The room is devoid of anything except a pair of oval openings placed on either sides of the room. The throne room is visible through them. Guard ponies flanked both sides of the long hall with stoic expressions. The stained glass windows tells the stories of feats of the group of ponied known as the Elements of Harmony. Most exciting of all, you can see Princess Luna seated beside in a regal pose busy writing down some notes on parchment paper while occasionally glancing toward her sister. It's not often that you get to see these together.

"I see that you've arrived at my eyes, Mage," Celestia said, "This is one of Star Light's favorite place during his stay within me. I tried showing him my daily routines around the palace to relieve him of boredom but I sensed him to be more interested in being able to look outside than royal protocols."

"It must be really depressing to be able to see things yet not being in control at all," you commented.

"Indeed...Star Light didn't take things as well as you do. During his stay, he pleaded me everyday to let him out of my body for some fresh air. But I sadly have to deny him that privilege as the dangers he faced in his shrunken state were too great."

Before you could offer a reply, a guard announced the arrival of...
111311.title: Brain/Eyes/Heart

1113111.content:
The guard announced the arrival of the newly crowned, the Princess of Magic, Twilight Sparkle herself, now seeing from the princess of the sun perspective.

"My faithful student.." You heard celestia as you see twilight approaching to her with a cute smile at her face.

"Princess! is good to see you again, I have many things to tell you..." and she began to talk with the princess unaware of you seeing her right now, you cannot believe the you're seeing her, the famous princess of magic and element of harmony, well, bearer of one of them. you admire her since she was an unicorn, being pupil of the princess you're inside now, you never heard a pony with such mastery of magic, you even developed a crush on her but there is a problem; you are a human and she is a pony and princess, love would be impossible.

"You love her, don't you?" Talking about it, the voice of the princess resound in your head, you almost forgot that you were inside the beautiful eyes of Celestia.

"N-no, I mean, I don't think she would like me, Anyway" you were interrupted by a soft laught from her.

"Why? you two would be a cute couple together." you heard her chuckling. you face is mostly red from embarrassment, you continue looking at the outside world, staring at twilight while she's talking with Celestia you seems to notice Luna to be staring at her but for a brief of moment you thought that she was seeing you instead of her sister, you become nervous seeing the Princess of the Night, she was the one that almost destroyed humanity, you hold no grudge because she was possessed at that time. but still, seeing her scare you. Celestia sense this and suggest something else.

"Prehaps you could continue your adventure in my brain, my sister probably not believed my story and is sensing you within me, maybe talking to her will ease her."

"What about Twilight?" you notice that she is still talking with her mentor.

"Oh, yes, Maybe we can share our little secret with her"

"What!?" you ask shocked for her sudden plan.

"You think that Luna and I were the only ponies that know about this enchantment? Twilight know this spell, In fact, she got anatomy lesson inside of me once, I can say that like you, she took this experience quite well than Star Light," you suprised to hear this, Twilight know about this spell? you couldn't help but wonder as you exited the eyes and going toward princess's brain.

***

Outside
The princess was listening to Twilight's studies story, when she notice that celestia was uncomfortably silent, soon she began to panic believing that she might have bored her with a long studies' report. The princess notice this and began to talk to her.

"Twilight, I need to tell you something, Remember when I teach you about pony anatomy?" she and twilight leave the throne room, leaving luna with the last remaining parchment.
1113111.title: Twilight Sparkle

11131111.content:
The Princess' brain was just a short walk from her eyes because of their proximity. A set of stairs in the fleshy corridor leads toward your destination as indicated by a sign. The ground trembles rhythmically, leading you to believe that Celestia is walking toward someplace else. The sensation of the movement felt strangely comforting. You slowed you pace just to savor the feeling of being in the safety of the solar monarch's body. You imagined the way she walked and how well toned her alabaster body looked. A quick self reminder that Celestia probably could read your mind stopped you from thinking further in that direction. I really need to keep my mind out of the gutter. I'm in the Princess for goodness sake.

The passageway gave way to an even larger chamber. You originally expected to see a soft mass of wrinkles and folds. But the Princess' brain has more resemblance to a palatial library. The ceilings are tall and vaulted like the dining hall of Canterlot Castle. Tons and tons of tomes and books are arranged on shelves laid out in concentric circles. The library is quiet except for the echoes of you footsteps upon the floor. Some of the books looked worn and old while others have more contemporary designs. A quick browse of the titles and you found books about spells and Equestrian history. Others are about griffons, dragons, humans, and even a cake cookbook. You guess that Celestia's actual memories must be stored in another area in here.

The centerpiece of the chamber is a giant tapestry that depicts both Celestia and Luna watching over their kingdom. The Sun Princess has head raised high like the beaming sun above. At the opposite side, Luna looked serenely at her Moon and stars. Beneath the alicorns is the land of Equestria populated by the three races of pony. You quietly admired the work and thought about the countless legends you've heard before.

"Ahh, seems like the beauty within my brain has caught your attention," Celestia chimed, "This is one of Twilight's favorite places to be in me. She would spent days studying the memories I permitted her to look at. She has gotten so curious about me that she once snuck into restricted areas housing my personal memories and watched some things not discussable in polite company."

"I can imagine her doing that. I heard Twilight will go great lengths to obtain information."

"It's more than that, my human. She will go completely crazy if she is ever a minute behind her checklist or schedule."

"Wow...If I ever meet Twilight in here, be sure you always have a magical barrier handy."

"Don't worry. I bet you two will get along quite well."

"Yea, I think. So, what's this tapestry for?"

"If you're curious, that tapestry is the visualization of my relationship with my sister. It's the indication of the harmony within Equestria. You can say that it reflects my state of mind."

"...Wow, cool indeed."

"So, wanna check out some cute filly Twilight memories with me?

------

Meanwhile, the Princess has just finished an explanation about the human in her to Twilight, which greatly piqued the purple pony's curiosity.

"This is unbelievable. There is a human who fantasizes about living in you, Princess? He must be a very interesting person. I have to meet this human! Princess, could you please use that spell on me again?"
11131111.title: Continue

111311111.content:
"Right now, Twilight?" asked the princess of the sun, she saw twilight's eyes shine with anticipation, she smirked after noticing the enthusiasm that have her studient princess. she point her fore hoof at her head.

"He is right now in my brain, we were talking a little about this enchantment and few things about you" stated celestia.

"About me? Really? who is he?" asked Twilight, her enthusiasm replaced with curoisity, many ponies and people see her as another princess from royalty and wanted to be friend of her for status and such, she turned down all these, becoming a princess was not all rainbows and sunshines, it means responsability and behave, she didn't become a goddess-like like her mentor but many people and ponies tought otherwise, there even a cult in her name without her approving it!

It was annoyance to be a princess.

but meeting with a human that didn't see her as all powerfull alicorn with royalty status instead admire her for her studies on magic before ascension is unbelievable it would be her first HUMAN friend with a fantasy in living within her mentor and princess...

she couldn't no help but get excited a little.

"He is a mage, Twilight, a Archmage that without going into a proper school of wizards and sorcerers he managed to learn and master magic in his own, very powerful but also very shy, do not expect him to talk much, be easy with him." Twilight nodded, Celstia's horn began tu glow in golden aura and engulfing twilight with it, a sphere of pure energy surround her and shrink her into the size of a insect, she was floating with celestia's magic, Celestia's maw opens in front of her floating studient, she was excited to be inside of her teacher again. With a quick dash, the princess toss twilight into her mouth and swallow her instantly.

_______


You sat in a fleshy yet spongy chair looking in album of photos of twilight when she was a filly, she looked so cute back when she was an filly, these huge eyes and cute face almost made your heart stop by the grand amount of cuteness, you heard various misadventures of her thanks to celestia voice in your head, you got a good laught at how she can be so obsesive for a trivial thing, the princess agree, sometimes she told twilight to not be so obsesive with her studies but the pressure and fear of failing are her principal problems.

Twilight was already in her favorite place, the princess' brain, Celestia created an shortcut for her student to arrive more faster, she was glad to be again inside of the princess' beautiful body, she learned many things and yet she wanted to learn more about her innards soon she spotted the human sitting in a organic chair reading in what looks like an photo album.

her enthusiasm and excitement fade and change into pure horror and terror when she saw her worst nightmare come true... He was viewing an album of her earlies days as princess' student when she was a filly.

"Oh no..." she say before galloping full speed toward you.
111311111.title: Twilight's Entrance

1113111111.content:
The albums are an interesting look into the relationship between Twilight and Princess Celestia. Each lesson learned by the adorable filly was filled with success, failure, and everything in between. Whether the end results were smiles or teary puppy eyes or nervous breakdowns, Twilight eventually works around the challenges. You can slowly see why the Princess would want her as a protege. From these memories, you also learned that the lavender mare has an older brother named Shining Armor. Celestia told you that he is the Captain of the Royal Guards and have fought numerous wars for Equestria. Must be a pretty tough guy to make it that high, you thought.

Currently, you are on a page about one of filly Twilight's breakdown about mastering the teleportation spell. The pictures of her twitching, sleep-deprived face unsettled you. You were about to flip toward the next page to see the results when the book suddenly glowed purple and slammed itself shut. The sound of clopping hooves echoed from behind. Within split seconds, you felt yourself being painfully pinned down onto the ground and rolled over. Your eyes shrank when you saw Twilight Sparkle herself looking panicky at you. Her horn glowed as she dragged you up to her face.

"What memories have you read about? Did you see how I failed my transformation spell pop quiz? Anything about how I turned myself pink? Oh Celestia, did you read about how I cried and snuggled the Princess at night for a year for being afraid of the dark? Oh nonononono. This can't be true. Tell me, tell me, tell me that you didn't know my pet name!!!" the new alicorn exclaimed in rapid fire.

"Wow! Easy there. Calm down," you said in an attempt to ease the nervous mare.

Calm down? CALM DOWN?! How can I calm down when somepony is watching the most awkward moment of my past?"

"But Celestia allowed me to see them."

"Oh no. All of my failures are....Wait....The Princess permitted you to see the memories?"

"Yes. I came here at her invitation. Celestia can verify my claim," you said.

It's alright, Twilight. I just wanted to share some stuffs with the human. He is kinda curious about you., the sun princess' voice said in both of your minds.

*sigh* "You see, Princess, those memories are private and I'd appreciate it if you refrain from allowing this human mage any further access."

Hahaha. Alright, alright lil'Sparky. I'll try to ask you the next time I share my memories.

"Princess! Don't use that name when someone's around," Twilight blushed.

heehee. Just have some fun in there, alright. I got some royal duties to attend to now.

Princess Celestia return to her business, leaving you and Twilight looking awkwardly at each other.

"Anything you wanna do, your highness?" you asked Twilight.

"Hmm....Let's go to my old bedroom first. It's a short walk to the base of the horn. There is a lot we need to talk about."
1113111111.title: Continue

11131111111.content:
It was awkward, everything went silent after that little... well, incident? you don't know much, but you find it amusing in how twilight's embarrasse moments were before becoming a princess... well she still can be arkward herself.

after a minute or two, twilight lead you upstairs only to find a door, the door has a sigh labeled Twilight's Study Room Figures you roll your eyes, based in what you know thanks to Celestia and before her, few sourcers (*cought*Spike*cought*), twilight is basically a huge bookworm, if breathing were necesary, If eat and sleep were not a need, she would spend all that time reading books.

as your enter at the horn you notice that is not a room but a tower look-like, said tower has multiples bookshelves about magic and ancient types there is a stairs that probarbly goes to the bedroom and the center there is a glowing golden orb conected to the fleshy ground and the tower walls... could this be her ability to do magic?

"pretty impressive, no?" Twilight's voice caught your attention. "this is the base of the Princess' Horn, no this is not the entire horn. We really are that tiny now, Princess Celestia has power anything in her entire body, even us. We might not notice it but the corridors and stairs change our body's size for some specific places and organs" Said the lavender unicorn, that was amazing feat that have Celesta, then again, she is the princess, she can do anything.

That's correct, My faithful student.

"Thank you but I thought that you were attending some Royal Duties, Princess" Twilight added but she didn't respond.

"Anyway, now that we are here." she smiled while making a notepad and a pen from thin air, of course, made of magic, you take a breath after all, you will talk a lot.

Outside, the princess sat at the throne room attending few meetings with the mayors of manehatten and Cloudsdale along with her sister Luna, after all, night was near, hours passess and the meeting ends but Luna stop her sister before lowering the sun.

"Sister there is something that is worrying me"

"What is it, Lulu?"

"I felt a presence in you, like, you have somepony inside of your body, now I'm feeling the Holder of Magic inside of you along with that foreign presence." Luna speak softly concerned, she never felt something like that before at her sister, however, she smiled at the worried Luna.

"Well, yes sister, I have Twilight and a human in my body."

"You WHAT?!" she shouted in the end, almost in the canterlot voice, luckily for the small residents, the horn is so dense that the sound didn't affected them.

"Calm down, Lulu, is not a problem I didn't felt evil intention in the human beside, twilight is with him."

"I know that, the presence wasn't evil, just noticiable but the question is how and why there is a human in your body? Celestia proceed to lower the sun while Luna move the moon, it was nighttime now, Celestia started to explain the tiny visitor and his odd wish to be inside ponies and how he entered in her and how twilight was next and embarrased her as well. they both chuckled in the end, Celestia decided to sleep now and leave the Night duty to her sister, leaving her pondering at te human visitor inside her sun sister.

meanwhile inside, Twilight was keeping asking you even your eyeballs' weight! damn she is very, VERY curious and inquisitive pony, but you find her cute seeing this in this stage.

During this entire time, you both were talking about each other, (mostly you) however you yawn while looking the hour, you were suprised that it was already late!

Twilight look at this too while yawning herself, she notice she's already tired, luckily there is a room in tower.

"It seems is already late, there is a room with two beds in it, while they are from the Princess' flesh, they are very cozy, warm and soft."

"Wait? two beds?" You ask.

"Spike, he was with me, Baby dragons when sleeping and growing up tend to grow their limbs separately" they go to the horn's room upstairs when opening the door they notice no two beds but only ONE.

"You said there was another bed" You said a little irked.

"I know there were two beds here unless..." she gasped then narrow her eyes "That devil..." you look at her questionably "What?"

"Nothing!" she said quickly. "It seems that there is only one bed"

"Really?" you question sarcastically only to sigh in desbelief "If you want, I can sleep in the couch downstairs."

"What? No! I'll leep in the couch, you sleep in the bed." You frown.

"Twilight, you're the Princess, Royalty. I can't let you do that"

"No! I refuse that for my title to have a friend sleeping in a couch"

"what then? you asked finally gaing her attention.

"We could... eh... sleep together?" she asked shyly and blushing this suprised you "What?!"

"I will not accept a no as answer!" she said firmly shocking you again then again, you sigh in defeat.

"Alright, alright I'm too tired to continue arguing, let's just sleep" Twilight blush but smile at victory she archieved you two go the bed, they both notice how little was the bed was as your body pressed against hers, her soft fur touching your skin her face very close to your, basically you two were cuddling. Twilight has only one though in her mind. This was her idea from the very beginning... but I like it.
11131111111.title: Twilight's Bedroom

111311111111.content:
A bright light shone in the bedroom. Whatever that's shining is so intense that it rendered your eyelids ineffective at shielding out the light. You stirred in the bed for some time, trying to block out the light with the sheets before slowly opening your eyes. When you looked up from the bed, you saw the entire room glowing a brilliant gold. Everything from the bookshelves to the bed you're on is engulfed in the ethereal light. A subtle tingling sensation of magic courses through the entire chamber. As the veil of sleepiness fade, you recalled what happened in the last day and remembered that your are in Princess Celestia. That must be the Princess raising the sun, you thought.

You attempted to leave the bed but was held down by something. You felt it gave you a fuzzy nuzzle while mumbling some indiscernible words. You turned around and found yourself looking at Twilight hugging your arm with her fore hooves and her rear legs sandwiching your ankles together. Her face is right in front of yours, close enough for you to feel her gentle breathing. Her mane is disheveled and matted. As much as you're uncomfortable with the bookworm clinging so close to you, you couldn't help but admire how adorable she looks when she's asleep. The purple alicorn also has a cute expression upon her face as she continues to cuddle you while still talking in her dream. It's probably a good one as you can make out words like 'great', 'books', and 'friends'.

You gently gave her a nudge, causing Twilight to give off a very unprincess-like snort that echoes throughout the chamber.

"Awwwww, But Princess Celestia..... I want to learn more about transformation spells. Could we please extend class time today?", she groaned in her dream.

You stifled your laughter and gave her another nudge. This time, the princess stirred and her eyes gradually opened, revealing a large pair of mesmerizing purple gems. You saw your reflection smiling back in those half-lidded eyes. They are still filled with confusion and sleepiness.

"Uhhhhhh, what a good dream."

"Morning, Twilight." you greeted her.

Twilight's eyes suddenly sprang wide open and she literally jumped out of the bed.

"Gaaaaah!" she shrieked and teleported right on top of you, pinning you to the bed and gave you a death glare, "What in the hay did you think you're doing?!"

"Whoa easy there, Twilight," you tried to calm the alicorn, "I didn't mean to scare you like that. I'm just waking you up. That's all."

Twilight folded her wings and stepped off you but still giving you glares.

"Everypony really need to stop waking me up like this. First, Spike. Rainbow Dash. Now, a human mage that I only know for a day. Who wouldn't get scared if the first thing you see in the morning is someone's grinning face?" she motioned toward the ceiling.

"Well, you were the one who cuddled me in your sleep, princess," you grinned.

Twilight looked at you wide-eyed while her face blushed brightly. "Well I........ughh fine. Just do that again."

Before you could do anything else, you heard Celestia's voice reverberating in the entire chamber.

"Morning, fair mage and my dearest Twilight," you heard her voice beamed.

"Good morning, Princess." Twilight replied to her mentor.

You also gave your greeting to the Sun Princess.

"Did you two had a good night's sleep?"

"We did, Princess. Except the human scaring the hay out of my coat just moments ago when he tried to wake me, " Twilight said.

You heard Celestia chuckled. "Since we're all up, why don't we all head for breakfast. You two should head for the Eye Chamber. I have a table prepared for you two."

Twilight and you got off the bed, cleaned yourselves up, and set for breakfast.

When you reached the Eye Chamber, you two saw a table laid out in the center of the room with plates and utensils neatly placed on each end. Looking out from the Princess's eyes, you can see her seated in the Royal Dining Room enjoying some toasted breads and light salads with a cup of tea. She's holding a copy of the Canterlot Press with her magic, reading the headlines for the day. Across from her, you see Luna eating a bowl of cereal quietly while doodling on her copy of the newspaper. She has a tired and exhausted look on her face. For the Night Princess, this is probably her dinner before she retires to her chamber. On the very far side of the long table, you saw the infamous Prince Blueblood eating a lavish breakfast with numerous attendants at his side. You heard about his disdain for humans and ponies who aren't royalty. Not a particularly good impression. The Princesses don't seem to pay much attention to him as they continue eating their breakfast.

The sight is amazing in many ways. It is sorta strange to see the Princesses eating something so common and acting so casual, like the average citizen of Equus.

Celestia felt the two of you arriving in the chamber.

"Look pretty nice, isn't it?" she asked.

"It's a fine option, princess," you complimented, "Might I ask, what happened to Luna? And why is Blueblood here?

"Luna just had a rough night of dream patrolling. Several fillies and colts had nightmares after the release of a new horror movie. It was difficult trying to placate them of their fear. As for Blueblood, he is whining as usual about our lack of royal dining etiquette as well his nobility nonsense about being superior. It's best to just ignore him. Other than that, anything you two want in particular for breakfast?"

"I'll have the usual as always, Princess," Twilight replied.

"I guess I'll be having what you're having now. Some salads and juice would do," you said.

"Please take a seat and wait while I teleport the foods for you two."

Twilight and you sat down on the chairs provided and waited for the Princess to get your meals.
111311111111.title: Next day.

1113111111111.content:
The royal breakfast was all but that, Royal. when the food is served, the princess of the sun began eating while ordening her chefs for two Salads and Apple Juice, The chefs raised an eye brown but do as ordened, Blueblood's looked in curiosity as some unfortunate servants serve his food, Luna looked at her sister then in blueblood while eating her cereal with her magic, She chuckled.

"Aunty? why you ordened two more dishes? we are royalty we must conserve our renowned figure." Boasted the arrogant prince. Both Celestia and Luna rolled their eyes in such remark.

"These are no for me, nephew." she said with a false smile. In truth, she never liked blueblood, by tartarus, she HATED his family with every fiber of her being, each generation was more arrogant than the previous one, if his family weren't from Equestria's founders she would have striped from his status and leave him in the streets wearing nothing.

"Here are your dishes, Princess" stated one the chefs, she nodded and her horn glow, teleporting the ordened food inside of her Eye Chambers (Eye balls) for you and Twilight to eat,

"Thank you, You can go now." the chefs nodded and head back the kitchen, Blueblood looked at celestia with wide eyes an the sudden spell, Luna chuckled at his face.

when they finished their food Luna bid good day to her sister before heading back to her room for sleep, Blueblood goes outside with some unfortunate guards as bodyguards, Celestia decided to have a small flight around canterlot, her royal duties doesn't start now until much later.

Inside of the Eye Chamber, You and Twilight were still eating, you notice the change of scenary of the outside world until you heard the sound of wings flapping

"Twilight, Look! the princess of flying!" you said while looking from the princess eye, Twilight notice it too and she couldn't help but wonder while looking at awe the sigh of canterlot from the very high height, everyone, pony an human looks like ant from princess perspective.

"Wow, this is very high distance from canterlot, I can see my exlibrary from here" you rolled your eyes but chuckled afterward, Twilight glare at you.

"What is so funny?" she asked.

"that you need to get out more, Princess" you chuckled again but this time celestia chuckled as well."

"The mage is right, Twilight, so many books might convert you into one." You both heard the princess voice from beneath, your resist to laught while twilight glare on you with red in anger and embarrassment. Anger because of you laughting in that remark. Embarrassment because is true she spend most of her time in books, her embarrassment is more stronger than her anger so she sight in defeat letting out all her anger from her system.

"There is no royal duties until much more later, Me and Twilight can take to a tour within my body in the meantime" said the princess while lying down in a lone cloud she found in the skies of canterlot.

"Sounds good, Princess." you smile while Twilight smile as well wanting to lecture you about the princess insides.

"Good!" said Twilight with excitement in her voice "Since we are in the head we can begin our tour in the Princess' Spine-Train!" said Twilight while you and her finish the food, you look at her with in confusion.

"Spine-Train?" You ask she turned to you.

"in our size, the princess' body is enourmous, we would be walking for hours around here, so the princess created a transport system in her cervical, thoracic, lumbar, sacral and coccygeal vertebrae, These hours of walking become minutes using that." stated the young princess.

"In other words, her spine has a train so we can avoid hours of walking."

"that's a straightforward way to say it but yes, come, the train is in the backside of the princess' cranium."
1113111111111.title: Breakfast with Princesses

11131111111111.content:
You followed Twilight out of the Eye Chamber. Before reaching the doorway, you briefly caught sight of Celestia plunging her muzzle into the cloud as she lie down to relax. The Princess seems rather laid back right now. But she probably has to deal with excruciating meetings with officials and boring lectures from visiting dignitaries, or worse, listening to the nobles (likely Blueblood) throwing fits when they didn't get what they ask for. Celestia sure knows how to manage her time and temperament.

"What are you waiting for, mage? Don't you want to check out Celestia's body parts?" Twilight's voice echoed.

Your thoughts snapped back to the present. You turned your attention back to the alicorn and gave her a sheepish grin.

"Sorry, Twilight. I kinda drifted off. Anyway, please lead the way, princess."

For the next 15 minutes, you walked with Twilight through numerous hallways and spiraling stairs that rivals the complexity of Canterlot Castle itself. Instead of the color scheme of the castle, the halls inside Celestia is mostly white with blue and yellow accents. The gold-purple parquet floor echoed every time you and Twilight stepped on it. On both sides, the hallway is lined with marble statues of Celestia in various poses. On the walls are paintings of various cities in Equestria. You looked at your surroundings in amazement but Twilight seemed unfazed. The nerdy princess has been in here so many times that she probably consider it her third home after Canterlot and Ponyville.

Numerous time on your way, you looked down and indadvertedly caught glimpse of the purple alicorn's swaying flank. But you always quickly looked up and scolded yourself for doing that lest you want to incur the wrath of the bookworm. But admittedly, her flank does look nice...

After 15 minutes have passed, you two passed through a large gate marked "Main Station". The station is a replica of the one in Canterlot complete with a large platform and a rail track that leads toward a large white tunnel. You spotted a train similar to the Pony Express waiting for you two. The train is painted to the colors of Celestia's body with a decals of her cutie mark emblazoned on the sides.

Before you had time to admire the train further, a speaker on the platform made an announcement.

"Final boarding call for Princess Twilight Sparkle and the Human Mage. Your train will be leaving in five minutes. This is your final call."

The voice was none other than Celestia's.

Twilight first boarded into the coach and motioned for you to come. You entered the coach and found that the entire car has only two seats and is plushly decorated. Princess-class accommodation, you mused.

No sooner you two are seated, the train rumbles to life and journeyed down the track.

After the train entered the tunnel, a pony walked in from a door in front of you and Twilight. The pony was a young white alicorn with pink mane and braces on her teeth. She also bore a sun cutie mark. The alicorn beamed a very adorable smile at both of you.

"Thank you for joining us on the Princess Celestia Body Tour. I'm Celly and I'll be your guide for the day. First of all, has anyone wondered what the interior of the most powerful pony in Equestria look like? What are the differences and similarities between the Princess and ordinary ponies? Well, you're about to find out. If you have questions feel free to ask me."

Twilight giggled at the introduction.

"Princess Celestia loves immersion and role playing," Twilight whispered to you.
11131111111111.title: Continue

111311111111111.content:
"Next stop, to the Lungs!" Celly shouted as she leave you two, suddenly the speed of the train increase to much for your liking, since Celestia laid resting her head and neck on the cloud the neck in now straight and aligned with the rest of the spine.

You holding on to your seat for your dear life while Twilight is reading a magazine without care about the train speed "How you could be so calm while train is going to uncontrolable speed"

Twilight looked at you with smile but no a kind smile, the smile is more "You're scared are you?" she giggle.

"This is nothing compared to the first time I took a ride here" she said while continue reading her magazine.

"Wait, first time?" you asked in desbelief.

"Yep! we are half of its true speed actually, this train may looks like the Pony Express but it got the speed of a Bullet Train" she said while passing another page, this made your eyes go wide, but before say something Celly returns with the same adorable smile.

"We'll be arriving to the Lungs station in ten minutes please withdraw your luggage before arriving the station" she giggle as she disappear in a flash of light from her magic.

"But... how? we recently got here five minutes ago..." you said suprised,

"I told you, this is a very fast train, without adding the fact the princess' neck is straight and aligned to the rest of her spine, is just 5 five minutes of travel in full speed, in this speed is 10 minutes straight however, if the princess were in her standard posture it will took more time like 20 minutes... unless you like roller coaster" she shrudded remembering her first time in the train, Celestia's Pranks make Rainbow's and Pinkie's looks like amateur works.

"Well, since we are going to the lungs, what it looks like?" You ask with curiosity.

"The lungs is very vast place, in our currect size is like deserts that fills itself with air and the skies are the trachea and aveolar sacs, luckily for us that we are arrving to a station, there is a elevator that goes directly to air collector of the lungs and magic essence factory near the heart."

"Air Collector? Magic Essense factory?" you ask, you never heard about these places before in your anatomy book, probarbly the princess' doing.

"Yes, Me and the Princess will explain later on, the magic essence factory is conected to the heart's magic factory, In fact all three factories are conected, the Air Collector transform part of the Oxygen to make the Essence, the Essence goes to the Heart to be transformed into magic particules, the particles goes directly to every part of her body, specially the horn where is more concentrated, the orb we saw in the horn's tower is a magic node, there are many in each part of the Princess' body."

"Good work, Twilight!" Celly appears again, it seems that the train is decreasing its speed until fully stopping in another station, there is a sign that said "Lungs Station" outside, Celly brighted and smiled showing her braces teeth "Our tour can begin now!" she exclaimed, you three exited the train and go to the station's elevator that goes directly to the Lungs' Air Collector.

Outside Celestia is relaxing in the cloud she extended her will to a mini 'avatar' in her body so she can accompany her student and the human.

"I wonder if the mage drink some of my magic blood in my heart" she mused in the though a little. A pony or human drinking from alicorn's blood would have part of her power, while no powerful as her, said individual could be as powerful as twilight now.. she chuckled thinking in you.

"Princess! Princess!" an pegasus guard appeared with an alarmed expression in his face flying toward her.

"What's wrong Guard?" she asked with curiosity.

"Princess! Blueblood is out of control, He's has been demanding the exile of all humans and human-lover from canterlot and equestria believing that Ponies should remain pure and execute these who opposse him."

"What?! how this began?" She asked startled and angry.

"He heard a colt talking about all the negative blueblood is, how pompous, arrogant and bastard he is, when he asked who are his parents to exile them he got enrage that his father is in fact a human and the one that was telling him all these claims, he declare that ponykind should remain pure and exile humankind and ponies who support them" now celestia was angry, not just for wanting to exile him and his family, he has been doing this to anypony who talk to him like that, but exile an entire race just because his father' species is the breaking point, humankind has been part of her and her sister kingdom as well multiples species from all Equis living in Equestria in peace. She rise up with wings unfolded and hardened expression in her face.

"That's it! Blueblood stepped out of the line, he's no longer a Prince! take me to him, Guard, I need to stop his stupidity"
111311111111111.title: The First Stop

1113111111111111.content:
The elevator reached the Air Collector with a beep and a jolt. When the doors slide open, Celly led you and Twilight out into a lobby where she go over some safety instructions while inside the Air Collector.

"It'll be incredibly windy inside. For your safety, please do not venture away from the tour for any reasons. With that said, let's go!"

Celly took you to a large door marked "Air Collector Caution: Strong winds beyond this point." She inserted her horn into a hole to unlock it with her magic.

"Hold on tight," Twilight tells you.

As soon as the door opened, strong winds whipped up, causing you to almost fall over. The gust alternates direction as Celestia inhales and exhales. Celly conjured up a magical forcefield to protect you and Twilight.

"This way please," chimed the guide as she lead the way.

The size of the lung is just massive, just like Twilight told you; it's basically a world in itself. In every direction, you see nothing but the horizon line and a landscape of flesh and veins. Everything in here expand and contracts as air rushed in and out in intervals. Describing it as a desert would still be an understatement and this is only one lung. You looked around at the size and imagined that it must be large enough to hold hundreds of full grown dragons without problem. Above, masses of glowing orbs are suspended from the ceiling like organic chandeliers. pulsates in a steady pattern. They also act as a light source in here.

"We are now in the Air Collection section of the lung. Like every living thing in Equestria, this is where all airs entering the Princess's nostril will come to. The large hole over there leads to the trachea which is connected to the throat, mouth, and nasal cavity," Celly explained, "As a little quiz, can any of you tell me what are those things in the ceiling called?"

"Those are alveolar sacs, Celly," Twilight replied within a split second.


"Correct, Twilight. The orb-like structures lining the ceiling are called alveolar sacs. Their job is to absorb the oxygen in each breath we take and send it into our bloodstreams. They also serve as the primary point where raw magic is absorbed and stored in our bodies. Even though all ponies and even humans have this capability, their effects are most prominent in unicorns and alicorns."

"One question though. Does simply breathing allows you to acquire magic?", you asked.

"Yes. That's the simple way of saying it. It would be too complicating if we were to go down the technical route," Celly smiled.

You hear Twilight clearing her throat with a dorky smile. It is clear to you where this is going. There's no stopping Twilight when she goes into 'bookworm' mode.

"To put it in a way that most ponies and humans can understand, the air itself in Equestria is teeming with all sorts of magic. It's one of the basic forces of the world. It's ubiquitous and produced constantly. Everything from trees, rivers, and rocks to the air we breath contains potential magic that can be converted into its kinetic form if a magic user knows how to utilize it. For alicorns like Princess Celestia and I, we absorb the magic around us and store it in the a small lobe of the brain directly beneath the horn. It's known as the
magilium cerebellum. When we use magic, we simply release the energy store in there and mold it into whatever spell we want to use. The power will vary from unicorn to unicorn. As a mage, you used magic reciting incantations to concentrate them at a single given point in space. The..."

"Okay, Twilight. I think I get your point. That's the easy version? I'd hate to think about what the hard version looks like. And Celly's right about the technical stuffs. It's making me dizzy," you said as you massaged your temple.

"Sorry. I always can't resist the opportunity to share some info," Twilight grinned sheepishly.

"Blu... Okay. Looks like we're all set to visit the Heart! This way up those stairs," Celly exclaimed.

-------

Outside, a very upset Celestia arrived on her balcony in the castle. She tried her best not to let her emotions influence the 'avatar' guide. Though Celly has some degree of autonomy, she's still part of the Celestia. The guard who informed her of the prince's latest trouble returned to his post after saluting the Princess. Blueblood has been enough of a problem and something must be done. But that spoiled prince probably would never learn. Perhaps Luna was right, Blueblood was long beyond saving.

The Princess marched through the palace with guards and other staffs shrinking from the normally-benevolent monarch's sight. She stopped at the entrance to Blueblood's quarter and shoved the door open with the full force of her magic. The Prince who was enjoying a cup of tea spill it all over his pristine white coat, a expression of fear and uncertainty on his face.

"A...aun..auntie....?" Blueblood managed to form.

"Silence!!!" Celestia demanded, " I thought that you would get better and drop your expression of speciesism and purity. I'm sadly mistaken.... Today, you overheard a colt expressing nothing but the truth about your character. Not only did you not accept his words, you even call for the exiling of humans and ponies who have relationship with them. All because the colt's father is a human. Don't you ever think about the consequence of your actions? I have lost count of how many times I asked you that question. But I will tell you the consequences this time. Your actions are extremely unbecoming of a royal prince. As the Princess of Equestria and Raiser of the Sun, Prince Blueblood III of Canterlot, I hereby stripped you of all your titles and offices."

".........." The former prince remained silent.'

"Where's the usual snide, Blueblood? Aren't you going to beg me for the umpteenth time? Where's the "my ancestors fought for and served you well" defense? You possess no qualities whatsoever to even mention them."

".........."

"Don't you think I'll let you off easily like I used to do. I have a better place to imprison you. Somewhere I can keep a constant eye on you and, hopefully, set you straight."

Blueblood's eyes went wide as he saw the Princess close in with her horn lit.
1113111111111111.title: the Lungs and Blueblood Downfall.

11131111111111111.content:
The trek toward the heart was uneventful at best except for the constant strong beat from the heart itself seemed to getting close with each beating. you began a conversation.

"Wow, sure the heart is big too, these are very strong heartbeats" You said with hint of surprise, this went noticed by both alicorns. Celly answer.

"Well, yes, that's depending of the pony's size, for example Twilight have the size of a normal pony her heart is the size of, to put it simple, grow up human's fist, but in Celestia or Luna size is the size of a pony or human's head!" Your eyes went wide again in suprise, hearing that simple explanation.

"Big as a human head?" you ask. this time it was twilight's time to answer.

"The heart of the princess need to be bigger for the magic conversion in the Magic Factory, similar to a horse, the heart is more rounder and heavier than a standard pony, you will see why." said the young princess.

"We are here!" said Celly, there was a small corridor and a giant door guarded by two white alicorns with heavy gold armor, both of them seems to be "clones" of celestia herself but with the same emotionless or "stone" expression of the Royal Guard, kinda funny seeing the princess like that but worry you a little.

"Oh, these are the "Royal White Cells"" Celly giggle a little at your dumbstuck expression. "we transformed our white cells in this particular area to protect the heart from special danger." she finished, until the guards block the doors.

"halt! state your business" one of the guard said with celestia's voice.

"We are here for the tour of the heart, fair guard, there is nothing to worry about." Said Celly both guard look each other before looking on you two, they both nodded and open the door.

"You may pass, but don't get closer to the Heart's prison for your safetly." Celly and Twilight nodded but you got confused about the prison.

"There is a prison? no, better question, there is prisoners here? in the heart of the most important pony in the world?!" you almost shouted. drawing attention of the guards as well. Twilight's laught nervously before telling the guards that everything was alright, she turned to you.

"Well, there are two reasons why the Princess' heart is important; one is the heart itself no only pump the blood to mantain her alive, is also transform the magical essence absorbed by the lungs' alveolar sacs, as explained early, with our lungs we absorb magic from the environment, however the magic stored in our bodies affect most of our organs, specially the heart. For unicorns, their heart its completely hard like a rock but for alicorns is almost hard as diamond, that's lead the second reason; this hardness make the heart the perfect place to protect or imprison, there are two buildings inside the heart, one is the magic factory and the other the most secure prison of all Equestria." You nodded at twilight dumbstruck by the explanation. you two enter to the gates as the guards close it.

"Wow... Amazing" you three entered in a tunnel, the walls' membranes working as windows to look inside the heart almost like an aquarium, the heart's big as canterlot's palace, but rounded and pumping blood in and out of valves, gateways and other tunnels, there are two building visible at the inner walls of the heart, one has a huge orb core glowing in gold in the center, the building has mutiples gates for the blood to enter while others are expulsing it with another golden substance in the mix, the Magic Factory? you though.

The other building was surrounded by multiples white submarines and guards in diving suits, it was visible other guards inside of the building patroling.

"Wait! its a mistake! I regret saying that, please auntie don't leave in this horrid place, please, AIEE!! My mane!" You all Three heard a whining voice behind, it turn out to be blueblood himself being dragged by Two Guards toward the tunnel's prison but before enter he looked at you, his face of horror turned to anger as he liberate himself from the guards' grasp chargin at you.

"YOU! You and your species are to blame! Thanks to your race I'm no longer prince!" he charge on you with horn pointed in you but you were prepared, your arms glow channeling your magic.

"Oh no you don't, vulneribus!" you mutter as suddenly the former prince is trapped inside a energy cube with no way out.

"No! NO!!" he yells as some guards grabs the cube with magic this time, there as huge "NOOOOOOOOooooooooooooooo!" as the Tunnel's open, welcome him the promising horrors inside the guarded part of the heart.

"That was incredible, what spell is that?" Twilight looked at you with stars in her eyes, she never seen a human magic before just in books or in lesser forms.

"Is just a simple containing spell, nothing fancy or powerful, it will wear off in time without more magic to sustain it."

"I must say that was a suprising your reaction, mage, that horn was sharp and aimed to your heart." an female voice very different from Celly or Twilight or even celestia talked behind you, your turned around only to see only Princess Luna herself in all her glory.

"Princess Luna!" Both the three of you bow at her, Luna chuckled seeing two princess (or a princess and avatar of one) bowing. "you two don't need to bow to me, you are princess, Twilight, and Celly... You why bow to me?" The Avatar alicorn giggle, Luna rolls her eyes "Nevermind, You may rise Mage." you do as ordened.

"Princess, nothing bad and all but, why and how are you doing here? normaly you sleep in day and you work in the night, I saw you very tired in the morning." You said with curiosity, it was true after all.

"Indeed you're right, Mage, this is no the real me, my body is resting in my bedroom but I placed my conscious in very small avatar to visit my dark side here. I'll been doing this each weekend."

"Your darkside?" said twilight confused when suddenly she gasped "You mean Nightmare Moon?! I though the elements eliminated her from you!" You and Twilight were suprised and shocked except Celly, Luna sigh before explaining,

"After you and your friends used the elements to rescue me from her I was not completely free. Nightmare Moon wasn't utterly gone just retreated back to my mind, my sister knowing this offered herself to safeguard my darkness, at first I denied her but after hearing her ways to deal with her, I let her guard my dark persona, however, After visiting my darkside for sometimes, I discover that isn't a evil spirit but an jealous spirit, since then, me and my sister are trying to turn her to a good spirit but she still refuse, I wasn't expecting you to found in my sister's heart, after you tour in the heart, I can accompany you but for a while, this body will disappear and my mind will come back to my original body within two hours, maybe a little visit to the liver, is a short walk from here there is the good place... a very FUN place" she said almost squealing.

You look at her oddily until Celly whisper to you "The Liver is where the Game Zone is, she is a hardcore gamer" You drop you jaw after hearing this, it seems that the "Gamer" Luna rumor is true... she isn't the same MoonMaster24 you added as friend in steam? you shrugged in thought, the trio go to the Magic factory while Luna go the heart's prison to visit Nightmare Moon.
11131111111111111.title: The Heart and Blueblood's Prison

111311111111111111.content:
You three reached the Magic Factory by taking another tunnel leading toward the bright beacon. Along the way, there are several more Royal White Cells standing guard against any unwanted guest. Despite being clones of the Princess, the nature of their work meant that they have some differences in terms of physiology. Tall, muscular, and intimidating; Qualities befitting of a seasoned castle guard. Any threats to the Princess When they saw Celly and Twilight walked by, the guards saluted firmly without looking at the group. The last pair of guards opened a double door and ushered you all into the Magic Factory.

The first impression you have of the place is its distinctive design. Tall columns circled the entire complex to form an atrium, much similar to pegasi architecture. The structure itself is built from sturdy heart muscles that feels like solid rock beneath your feet. Twilight previously noted that it's hard like diamond but that doesn't make much difference now. The general view of the factory gives you a rough idea of the mechanism used here. Blood is pumped in through a series of transparent pipes in the ceiling before they're directed to a series of concentric aqueducts. The blood then flows into a large pool where the large orb occupies the center, supported by a pedestal decorated with ancient Equestrian glyphs. The sound of Celestia's heart is very prominent as the factory works on.

"Alright. This way please," Celly requested.

The guide led you and Twilight to a front desk. Celly lead you to a series of clothing racks and helmets placed on the desk.

"We have to put these on to keep the area clean. The helmets are needed in case any excess blood rains down."

The three of you searched for the appropriate size of the equipment and get dressed. When you're all ready, Celly directed you all to a platform overlooking the series of tubes from the ceiling.

"The pipes in the ceiling are connected directly to the return heart chamber outside. As the blood is pumped through the Princess's body, the magic imbued in them are gradually absorbed by the organs it was carried through. Once all magic is used up, the blood will appear almost dark purple. At this point, their job is to merely carry oxygen. The depleted blood is then drawn into the Magic Factory and directed to the aqueducts where they will sent down to the replenishment pool."

Celly pointed to the large pool as she took flight of stairs down. Once you got to the first floor of the factory, you and Twilight look at the large glowing ball in awe.

"The glowing object on the pedestal is magical essence collected earlier from the lung. Do notice that the pool and aqueduct are all smooth and gentle sloping. The reason for that is to prevent air bubbles from forming and causing problems later on when they're in the veins. The pool could hold enough blood to sustain the princess for three hours, meaning the factory performs this process a total of 8 times a day. Once the pool if full in a minute, the magic begins," Celly grinned.

Within a minute, the blood stopped flowing and the magical essence on the pedestal shine brighter. Tendrils of pure magic shot out from the orbs and strike the surface of the blood. It looks like the blood is being electrified with glowing yellow arcs dancing across the entire factory. A stray bolt of magic connected with Twilight's horn, causing her to jerk abruptly.

"The magic is really strong this time. That's the most intense magical charge I encountered in a while," the purple alicorn said.

After five more minutes of a spectacular light show, the tendrils from the orb receded back leaving a bright red pool with sparking with golden shimmers before you.

"The recharging is now complete," Celly said, "Under normal circumstances, the blood will be drained to rejoin the circulatory system. But for today, I would like to share with the Mage a little alicorn secret. This is the Royal Blood in its most powerful form. In this state, it will grant anyone who drink from it immense magical power."

"....So the ancient books weren't lying about this. Incredible! It also reminds me of those dodgy merchants who claimed to have retrieved a vial of Celestia's blood back at my town. I always thought that it was an old pony's tale," you said.

"I used to think the same way as you, mage," Twilight admitted, "But after becoming an alicorn, I learned from the Princess her blood does enhance the magic of whoever drinking from it. She used to grant them in the Old Equestrian Age (450 years ago) to anyone who she deemed worthy enough to receive it."

"With such power...wouldn't that be problematic if that power falls into the wrong hand?" You asked.

"Which is exactly why I'm asking you to never let this information out. All books containing this fact are already locked in the restricted portion of the Canterlot Library. Could you just imagine the numbers of attempts on the Princess's life if this became common knowledge in Equestria?" Twilight said worriedly.

"You have my words, Twilight. No words will leave this factory," you assured her.

"So, are we gonna take a drink or what?" Celly asked at the sideline.

"Huh? Celestia actually wanted me to drink it? What did I do to warrant such an honor?" you inquired.

Celly giggled. "Her reasoning might sound a little trivial. When you used that spell when Blueblood charged at you, you not only acted in self-defense. You also tried to protect Twilight from imminent danger. That large horn of his could have easily impaled you yet you are willing to take the risk to defend the princess. That bravery really impressed the Princess."

"Celly, just tell the Princess that I'm just doing what's I feel was right. I don't think I'm worthy to receive her blood for such insignificant task," you said politely.

"The Princess really insists that you drink it. If not for the bravery, then take it for giving Blueblood his flank on a plate."

"No, I still can't...."

"Then do it for me, for Celestia, will you? Pleeeeeeeaaaasssee....." Celly pleaded as she used her best puppy eyes and pout.

"Uh......so much cuteness....princess...I mean Celly, you're not a filly. Please...stop!" You tried to resist those eyes.

"Plllleeeeease!" Celly pouted again but intensifying her eyes.

"Still not giving in."

"PWEEEEEEEEEEEZZ!!!" Her pupils are now larger than physically possible. Those watery purple pools are close to getting their job done.

Too much cute. Obey Celly. Can't take anymore. Resolve collapsing fast. All down.

".....Fine," you finally muttered.

Celly's face cracked up into a big brace-revealing smile and gave you a tight hug.

"I knew you would yield eventually. So far, still no one can resist my cuteness. Not even Luna."

Three tall wineglass materialized in front of Celly. She took them in her magic and scooped the sparkling blood into them. The alicorn levitate two glass to you and Twilight.

"Cheers!" You three said at the same time before downing the cup.

"I don't know about you two but the blood reminds me of unsweetened soda with some hints of alcohol. Now, I want to do some gaming."
111311111111111111.title: Magic Factory and Liver Visit.

"Oh, what's going on?" Celly's horn glow in ethereal gold and engulfing herself in white light when it ended, Celly was replaced by a grow up Princess Celestia.

"Princess! what's going on?" she said now worried, if Celestia want to talk with her in private it probarbly important.

"The tension between the Griffing Kingdom and the Dragon Tribes are rising, I'm affriad they may end in war in the end of the year, I need to go to the gryphons' capital city to stop this war before beginning."

"But how this affect Equestria if these Kingdoms go to war? Ask Twilight confused.

"Twilight, if the dragons wins, they will declare to war to us. their leader believe the dragons should reign the entire world, he thinks that the elements of harmony should be used by dragons' claw for the sake of his twisted goal, they are declaring war to the gryphon to get us."

"What?! but how this happend? the dragons have been our allies since the end of discord's reign, how this leader want to break thousand of years of peace for the sake conquering the world?!" now twilight was breathing frantically

"Calm down Twilight, there is still chance to prevent this. this warmorgen is still young and unexperience, many dragons aren't supporting him and its a good sight but I need to go in few days and I can't have the mage in me for safertly reasons."

"how is this relevant? he should leave in the moment you have to go." said the Young alicorn confused.

"Well, here is the thing Twilight, He cannot return to normal for few weeks." Twilight's eyes widen.

"What?! but how?" she ask now worried for you.

"Twilight, There is a reason why only ponies and few humans, drink from my blood. in ponies the effect of my blood is instant boosting they magic in just seconds but in humans, my blood's magic take effect in few weeks but in order take effect properly, the human's magic needs to undergo a transformation to made it compatible with my magic." she said while lowering her head with shame.

"in other words, he can't return to his normal size by his own until that happend" finished twilight before realizing something. "But we can return him to normal right? the corridors, tunnels and pathway in you change our size."

"Yes but that's different, in order for both of you to go to any of my organs, the enchanted corridors change your size to an extent and is continue to take affect until you all go out of my body. but we cannot use an grow spell on him, it will wear off by time and return to the size he initially changed so in order to return to normal he need to cancel his own spell."

"But he can't do that, He can't do magic in all during all that time!" she exclaimed

"I know, I need tell him in the end of the tour but he might need a guardian and my options are You or Luna but..."

"But luna can't be with him because her night duties and her body needs to be in a meditation state during Dreamwalk, oxygen will dwindle during sleeping, he will have hard time to breath during nighttime, possible dead suffocation!" she finished.

"And that's why my best option is you, Twilight, can I trust you in this task?" She ask only to twilight do a military salute.

"I'll do it, Princess! I will not fail you." she said without sweat but there was a problem.

"You notice it right? You cannot take care of him in that size, you will need do the same as me."

"You mean let him live inside my body? but I don't have the same bodily control as you do." She said a little in shame but is mostly true she can't do the same as the princess without the same body enchantment as the princess.

"That's no problem Twilight, I can teach you the spell, is really easy actually." Celestia said with an smile.

*30 minutes later*

You and Luna were exiting the Game Zone after a epic virtual battle, both of you are having an argument about being the best in some games, you both developed a friendly rivality after that time.

"I told you can't defeat me in Mortal Kombat!" You boast while luna pout.

"Still I defeated you in Soul Calibur and in Halo!" Exclaimed Luna, you two continue this until you encouter with twilight and Celly (who returned back to her young and cute persona)

"Let me help you with that" you offer youself to carry with the heavy equipment she have, she smiled you for your generous action and give you one of the saddlebags.
