1113111111111111111.title: The Liver

11131111111111111111.content:
The four of you entered the elevator which took you directly to the Lung Station where the train is already waiting. Celly led you all aboard and was generous enough to add an extra seat for Princess Luna in addition to yours and Twilight's. Once everyone is seated, Celly cleared her throat made an announcement.

"Alright now, everyone. The next stop will be the Intestine," Celly said, "Normally, this is where foods go through after digesting in the stomach; where nutrients from what's eaten are ultimately absorbed. For Celestia though, she can also use it to hide all sorts of miscellaneous items from prying eyes or palace officials."

"It may be a little impolite of me to ask, what exactly is the Princess storing in there that requires such tremendous security?", you asked.

"Well, for starters, she has half of the gold bits of the 'Royal Equestrian Reserve' stored in there. Insurance in the event that any unforeseen catastrophe occurred. I recalled correctly, Ponyville has constantly been on the request list for the last couple of years."

Hearing that, Twilight gazed around uncomfortably. The library and town has been destroyed and rebuilt countless times since she moved there. The aforementioned destruction caused by either crazy schemes, chaotic villains, or a spell mishap. Almost a million bits in damages has been raked up. But it was the last one that culminated in her ascension to a princess. Celestia got one thing right. There IS a 'price' to my princesshood and it will bite into my monthly allowance soon.

Twilight refocused her attention on Celly who was still talking the entire time.

"...most of the palace's treasure are also locked in the intestines away from prospective robbers. Who would have thought of that? A portable and highly inconspicuous location to stash the nation's money. Heh heh..."

"Wait! Let me get this straight. Does that mean that we've probably handled money that has gone a 'full trip' through Celestia?!," your eyes widened, "Sorry Celly, but that has some rather unappealing implications."

"No no no," Celly laughed, "Celestia wouldn't engage in such abhorrent jokes on her ponies. The storage sections are made of solid materials away from the fleshy portion of the intestines and she now uses magic to teleport them in and out of her body. Don't make any wild conjectures about the Princess next time. You just might get it right."

After several minutes of silence, the train pulled into the Intestine station and screeched to a halt.

"Oh lookie, we're here already!" Celly exclaimed.

The intestine is a hybrid between flesh and the marble interior of the palace; While the floor is set in stones, walls and ceiling retain their organic characteristics. Along the tube-like main corridor, you see multiple doors on either side. A quick peek into one of them revealed large safe-like structure with several layers of protection spells placed on it. You can make out the crates of coins that are stacked neatly in the room. Several identical rooms are found as you proceed down the hallway.

You curiously looked into another room that is refrigerated and found a large assortment of multilayer cakes laid out on a long table. Virtually all flavors is present and labeled. According to Celly, the Princess is a big fan of cakes and would indulge on several in a sitting much to the dismay of her doctors.

"A question I've been meaning to ask: Where did Celestia learned to create all of this in the first place?" you said.

"As a filly two millennia ago, Celestia discovered this strange spell book in her parent's library detailing how to modify the body to house a pony or human in it. Though forbidden to enter, her curiosity still got the better of her. She read that book everyday for months and tried mastering them behind out parent's back. It gradually dawned on me that she possessed this fascination with inner body mechanism; a fantasy, to simply put, of living inside a being. When Celestia decided that she's experienced enough to handle the spell, she unfortunately chose me to be the explorer of her body. But the worst part is, she didn't successfully alter her body and had me trapped in there for a day. I endured all the bodily process mentionable. It was only after my sister got an earful from our mother when she learned about it that I'm finally freed. Now, I'm still waiting for the right time to get back to her on that one."

"Hey! I didn't do that on purpose, Lulu! I wanted to experiment with this newfound spell. Didn't you also botched up spell before?" Celly defended.

"No, sister. Nothing I've done could compared to that. It was a far worse experience than being on the moon."

"Well. I guess you wouldn't mind me showing all those kinky stuffs I confiscated from you to the group, right? I still got them stored here."

The Moon Princess turned red at the jab. "You. wouldn't. DARE?" she spat.
11131111111111111111.title: Continue.

111311111111111111111.content:
"Awww, But Lulu, you were always the sharing type, what happened to that" Celly said an innocently tone, you and twilight found this amusing as the princess of the night turn red.

"But no the one who share her secret life to all!" Luna countered back "You was always the rebelious type Sister, but I never thought you would do this." finished Luna, Celly has a faint smile as she point a door that has marked "Luna's Confiscated Stuff" Luna was even more alarmed now. "C-can we talk about this?", Celly shook her head, since this wasn't the real luna but an avatar with her mind in it, she don't have enough power to stop this. Celly use her magic to open said door but she was interrupted by you

"Wait a minute? the Rebelloius type? I'm sorry but I find it hard to believe that Princess Celestia, the most regal pony of Equestria could have been the Rebel of the family." You ask, Celly smirked and decided to humor him, she use her magic to change her actual appareance, her pink mane and tail become a rainbow of darker colors (Purple, Dark Green and Dark Pink), her golden jewelry become black and more gothic looking, her sun cutie mark has a pony skull in the center, there was a peircing in her tongue and snout, and her coat is a little darker. you and twilight are shocked from this transformation, Luna however, raised an eyebrown.

"You forgot the cat-like eyes" This statement made you two eyes widen.

"Really?" with another flash of magic from her horn, she made eyes similar to a cat or dragon. "Now?" Luna nodded.

"C-Celly? this was-"

"Yes, Celestia teenagers years, She was always the rebel while luna the peacekeeper, these years were the golden years of Celestia. Breaking rules, Prankin nobles, Night Parties, she even abused the Time Travel spells to go night clubs of this time!"

"Wait this time? like now?" You ask. for a moment you heard Twilight's Celestia Admiration breaking like glass I can't believe it, my mentor and second mother figure was a Punk in her young... she was worse than Rainbow! she shook her head, while she still admire her and love her like a second mother she couldn't see her in the same way again. You in the other hand, was still shocked

"Yea, these years were the No-Rules years until our parents blackmail her with cake." She looked down with a sad expression in her face.

"At least they made the right thing in reforming you." commented luna, hoping that they would ignore her stuff's room but when Celly transformed back to her cute persona, there was a smile but no a cute smile but an "I didn't forget it" smiled.

"Now Lulu's stuff are right here!"

"NO, please stop sister!" Luna pleaded but the door's open revealing a series of boxes with Lunas' Cutie Mark in it, beneath it there the type of stuff in it, embarrasing photos, sex toys, plans for a amusement park... on the moon, a pirate disguise with all and wooded sword, Love letters and a book, basically this was no a storage room but a a living room, you could see a bed in there. the room itself got a organic look like the rest of intestine.

"Come on, what can be this embarrassing that can break the princess of night?" you said while you grab the pink book open a random page and star to read it loudy. "Dear Diary, today I find a cute looking-" suddenly the book shut by a scared looking blue avatar alicorn's magic. then she narrow her eyes on you. "You didn't see anything." she said in a stern tone. You nodded fearfully, no wanting the wrath of the night princess.

"Come on Lulu. there is nothing to be embarrased of... look at this" she brought a Huge blue dildo, said dildo have "Moon Breaker"' engraved in it "so this was your coltfriend? well it make sense since you alway said that he was big and strong..."

"TIA!!" A red faced alicorn shouted celestia's nickname.

"Alright... what is this buttom?" she pressed and dildo start to vibrated, she giggle perversely

"I swear that... that" Luna think in something to counter her sister's boldness, "'That' what? I have no secrets" said Celly, until Luna finally found something

"Your Birthday Party #1353." suddenly Celly eyes widen, the vibrato fall from her hooves. "Y-you can't be serious! You can't-"

"I will spread it to all Equestria the same photo of that party you burned from the album long ago" by instict, Celly become Celestia (again) and start glaring daggers at her sister while luna smile triumphantly.

"I will stop if you give that photo to me" she said calmy but if you could notice the edge of her voice like fearing that she have been discovered.

"I'll do it if you teleport this stuff to my room" Luna said in a business tone, Celestia nodded and teleported everything of her intestine's room to Luna's Room in normal sized, Luna made appear a photo you two couldn't see it well but celestia' frowned then she burn the photo with her magix.

"I can't believe it, my own sister blackmailling me" Said Celestia in a defeated tone.

"Hush now Sister, you always blackmailled with this stuff, I got my little sweet revenge now" she said smugly, the Sun Regent's pout in a childrish manner while returning to Celly's form again.

"You're not fun!" said Celestia-turned Celly while addresing the you two returning to her happy self "Good! we going to the Spleen!" she said.

"What the hay just happend?" Said Twilight.

"I have no idea..." You said as you four return back to the train..
111311111111111111111.title: Revelation and Luna's Stuff

1113111111111111111111.content:
Nothing eventful happened on the short trip to the spleen. All that can be heard is the humming of the train. Celly and Luna are seated far apart from one another, obviously still reeling in from their exchange moments ago. The sisters pretend to look away from each other while stealing the occasional glance when the other isn't watching. From the looks of their faces, there are signs that they are planning their next moves on how to one-up the other. You are amused by the sight; it's just rare to see Celestia and Luna being so petulant. But you got to admit that they look adorable acting like that. Hopefully this won't end with them sending one another to their respective celestial bodies. You look back at Twilight sitting next to you. You noticed her in deep thoughts with a somber look. Whatever is lingering on Twilight's mind is troubling her. But you can't tell what.

"Twilight, are you okay? Something seems to be bothering you since you talked to Celestia at the Liver Mall," you asked concernedly.

The purple alicorn popped out of her thought and looked at you puzzlingly.

"uh...It's nothing important. Just a daily briefing of the usual politics and diplomacy stuff," Twilight lied.

"I see...it must've been a real headache to follow all of those. I mean, Blueblood is already a pain in the flank; I can hardly imagine how you felt dealing with many more of those ponies everyday."

"Not really. I'm pretty used to those now. But diplomacy is an entirely different story. As a newly minted princess, I have to attend every meeting alongside with the Princess to learn about the inner workings of politics. So far, you got officials from other countries who followed ancient protocols dating before Princess Celestia and others who seek to take advantage of Equestria's economic dominance by giving us the short end of the stick. Really stressful when you think about it," Twilight commented.

"So is Celestia planning anything important lately?"

"Not that she told me about. From what I heard, there's gonna be some economic summit between the dragons and griffons real soon. But I'm fuzzy on the details," the purple princess answered with a half-truth.

Before you can ask another question, the train came to a halt as it slides into the Spleen Station. Celly was the first to stand up and take you all out onto the platform where she gave a description of the spleen..

"This is the Spleen. This area is charged with monitoring the Princess's body for any anomalies and automatically eliminate any potential threats both magical and chemical-based," Celly said, "You can say that this is the security system of the body, responsible for filtering blood for contaminants, detecting unfriendly spells, and tracking the prisoners held at the Heart Prison. If you all will come this way, you can get better idea of what I'm talking about."

You went with the group through a metallic doorway and into a large room equipped with several apparatus. One of them has a wall-sized display showing numbers and equations that you don't understand. The white letters flickered and rolled about around a map of Celestia, indicating unknown values for each body part. You tried to decipher the meaning behind it to no avail. The clip-clop of hoofsteps behind you indicated the arrival of a smiling Twilight, ready to flip on her 'bookworm mode' switch.

"The equation you see on there is the 'Starswirl's Magical Constant' and the Tramareon Principle of Force. Without going into the technical detail, those are measurements of the amount of magical distortion in a given space and the 'force' which you "push" your magic from your body. By watching these measurements, it is possible to anticipate the type of magic that a caster is about to use against you and initiate a counterspell," Twilight said.

You nodded at the new information. Your eyes fell on something even more interesting. A control panel with buttons and knobs is situated on a podium in front of display.

"Hey, Twilight. Any idea what does that do?" you said as you pointed toward them.

"Sure. The control panel is used to control the flow of magic through the Princess's body. Depending on the circumstance, it can be adjusted to give each organ equal amount of magical energy or concentrate them into specific areas like the horn to enhance the spell capability. More interesting, it can also switch on the cameras at the Heart Prison to keep an eye on the detainees. Celestia took me several times here before during my time at magic school to teach me the principle of balancing power."

"And why would you need that?"

"Long story short, back when I was taking the entrance exam for Celestia's School for Gifted Unicorns, a series of bizarre events and an explosion caused my magic to abruptly explode out at once. In the barrage of spells I barely had control over, I turned my parents into plants and burned the mane off one of the examiners. Celestia stepped in and used her power to redistribute my magic and restored order. Afterwards, the Princess noticed my magical potential as a filly and asked if I would like to study under her. A big yes later, I began my life as the protege of the Princess of Equestria."

"That's an interesting story," you said as you fidgeted with the control panel, "Any idea how you used this thing?"

"Umm...I don't think it's good idea to...OH MY CELESTIA! What have you done?" Twilight screeched abruptly.

"I just pressed the button marked "Sight Share". What's wrong?"

"THAT!" Twilight pointed to the screen.

When you turned around to view the screen, you see that it's depicting a first-person view of the Princess using her private bathroom. The sounds of something trickling sounded from the speaker. If that isn't awkward enough, her crotch and all its features are in plain sight and Celestia seems to singing a little tune to herself. The Princess even checked her Sun Cutie Marks with a wiggle.

"TURN IT OFF! TURN IT OFF!" Twilight panicked, "Celly's gonna murder us if she sees this."

"Hey. What's the pro........," a familiar voice said then stopped. You turned back to find Celly turning deep crimson with eyes shrunken to a pinprick."

Yup, we're dead.

"Hahahahahahahaha", Luna laughed out loud as she rolled on the floor, "Dear sister, I didn't know that you sing like that while you're using the washroom. So priceless!!! And it's clear now who's got the better flank!"

Celly glared menacingly between you and the howling Luna before stomping toward the control panel to switch the screen off.

"I...think it's time we move on to our next destination, am I right?..." she gritted her teeth.

Luna is still howling with laughter as tears roll down her eyes.

You will definitely love what I have in store for you at the Bladder," Celly grinned ominously.
1113111111111111111111.title: The Spleen

Few minutes after that little "accident" you all returned to the train but you couldn't help but shudder in the sudden feeling of doom, when the train ended in a new station Celly called you three to the Bladder Tour, upon arriving the bladder you couldn't help but stare in awe, the bladder itself was a giant spherical chamber with mutiples tanks of urine and some other Liquids you can't identify, mutiples tubes transporting the urine are connected to their respective tanks while other liquids you can't identify going in similar way but they are connected towards the bladders' organic walls.

You see the tubes going in and out they are store in different parts of the body, the moment that the princess feel the use of these chemicals, you see, unicorns or alicorns who feels the need to use a transformation in perfect sense they segregate these sames chemicals from their skin, here is different, here are in order.

"well, this refinery sure is big, I notice that, how many are here?" you said refering to the chemicals, as you all walk in organic catwalks above the tanks, for some reason a tank was calling your attention, it's green and bubbles come out of it

"Oh, that's what you're seeing is a potent form of acid capable to desintegrate everything in 5 seconds." now you're scared in going any close, while stomach acid can't affect you this acid probarbly has magic infused, however Celly was looking at you with a insane smile, the same smile that only monsters do upon seeing their prey.

"and is the perfect one for you" she said with an insane glee, neither Twilight or Luna doing nothing but stare, twilight has a paniked look but Lunas has an emotioless one, like she was especting something. ... or that's what you thought as you float on surface completely intact, this is acid? you thought incredully.

Celly was rolling in the flood laughing madly while Luna bring you back to the catwalk, Luna couldn't too but giggle while twilight's eye was twiching madly. you look at celly angry but confused as well. angry because of this prank, confuse in why the acid didnt kill you.

"This acid is very speciffic one, it don't consume flesh but... clothes..." Celly ended while blushing furoiusly in your naked form, you notice that too and try to cast some clothes quickly, it was useful spell for travels but unfortunaly you can't do magic something that alarmed and confused you until Twilight cast some clothes for you, you thanks to her but you see her and Celly with bright blushes while Luna's whistle and lean to the mares.

"He sure is big..." she add with a chuckle making the mares even more red than before, meanwhile celestia outside chuckle at her avatar's fortune and twilight's misfortune

"Maybe we should continue with Womb Tour" Celly regaining composure this confuse you.

"but what about the Kidneys?" you ask.

"The Kidneys are the only organ that the princess hadn't changed yet except for the creation of these chemicals also, isn't recommended to go there for safetly reason." you nodded and follow Celly to an elevator that go to the womb, Twilight still in shock, her eyes twiching, Luna rolls her eyes and drag her with magic.
11131111111111111111111.title: Revenge at the Bladder

111311111111111111111111.content:
The trip to the womb proceeded in silence with footsteps and hoofbeats the only thing to punctuate the air. Celly led the way with you slightly behind her and Twilight and Luna some distance in the rear. In this position, you couldn't help but notice the sight of the white alicorn's swaying flank. The way they move and swing with her steps. It's kinda hypnotic...You knew where this was heading and immediately purged the images from your conscious. And to make it all the more inappropriate, you are heading for the same location in the actual Princess. You thought about what to expect when you enter the Princess' most guarded space; untouched for centuries and too sacred to be gazed upon by ordinary ponies. It will be a sight indeed. I might be the first human to lay my eyes upon her womb, you thought,Intriguing and frightening at the same time. Nothing much happened until you felt a light prod to your side. You turned your head to find Celly looking at you with a mischievous glint in her eyes.

"You curious, mage?" Celly asked.

"Huh?" you bumbled.

"You were staring at my flank for some times now. While I don't really mind that, I bet you're thinking about what a goddess can do," the alicorn cracked a cocky grin, showing her braces.

"Oh no no no..." you exclaimed as your face turned a deep red, "I didn't mean to. You're in front of me and it's inevitable that will happen."

"Awwwww, don't be so coy with me," Celly said, her grin widening, "I've seen those confused looks far too many times. One that wants to experience something new yet fearful and uncertain."

As Celly said that, you grew more nervous.

"No, it wasn't like that," you tried to argue, "I didn't pay attention to where I was looking."

"Celestia wouldn't mind if you're interested in her. In fact, she'll find it quite nice. You have some good tastes, mage," Celly giggled as she took in your shocked expression.

"I don't know how to feel about this. Sounds wrong on so many levels," you lowered your voice.

"It's okay for a pony or human to have a crush on Celestia. Otherwise, how did she get all those suitors who came from all across Equestria. Unicorns, Pegasus, earth ponies, and even a few brave humans," Celly said as she craned her neck over and gave a light peck on your cheek.

"Wha....Celly?! What in the hay was that about?" you exclaimed.

"Take that as an apology for the prank I pulled at the bladder," Celly grinned as she continued forward.

You stared at Celly with a dozen of questions running through your head. Alright, the Princess just kissed me or more accurately, with her avatar. What is going on with her? I thought Celestia would be a little more discreet with her intentions...

"Heh heh heh. Princess...Celestia... Just... Kissed... The mage. My teacher and second mom....," you heard a manic voice laughed.

You turned your head and saw two alicorns with very different expressions. Twilight Sparkle was shell shocked from Celly's action, taking further toll on her already fragile psyche. Her twitching eyes and crooked smile being the dead giveaway. She dragged her hooves as her heads tilted side to side with a wide unnatural smile on her muzzle. Her mind is still processing all the new things she learned about her mentor so far. Princess Luna was blushing and whispering things to herself. No doubts about her sister.

This is just getting crazy. I have a foreboding feeling about this.

You all arrived at the womb minutes later. The first thing you noticed is the immense size of the chamber. Tub-like tanks are arranged in neat rows. They look large enough to hold and completely submerge a stallion with more rooms to spare. The tubs are made from a translucent material that feel rubbery. You counted at least 100 of them in this chamber The high ceiling is filled with a wide assortment of wires and pipes the pumps liquids into the tubs. Other than that, there is a peculiar smell lingering in here. You couldn't describe it but it's weirdly alluring. Luna and Twilight also seemed to noticed it. You decided to ignore it for the time.

"This is the Healing Center," Celly announced, "The uterus is used as a hospital-like facility to care for the ponies that are severely injured. During times of war in the past, the Princess will use her spell to take in all the soldiers or civilians she could save and put them in these tanks where they healed over a period of a week. The ponies in the tubs are submerged in a medical liquid with oxygen provided by a tube and foods fed through another attached to their belly buttons."

"Basically these tubs are miniature placentas, right?" you mused.

"That is correct, mage," Celly said, "Ponies who been here are considered to be reborn by the Princess, the greatest honor that's receivable in a war."

"Speaking of that, how long before we get to see your ovaries, sister?" Luna joked.

"We will get there shortly, Luna," Celly said awkwardly, "Come along, I have a lot to show you."

1113111111111111111111111.title: Left Ovary

11131111111111111111111111.content:
The Right ovary is just across from the left, linked together with the Fallopian tube. You walked behind Celly as she leads the way. Nearby, Luna carried the out cold Twilight on her back while blushing intensely. After what happened in the extraction chamber, you still felt a little queasy from the intense action of Princess Celestia. The method she used was questionable and just unconventional. But maybe your sample is exactly what she needs to create the perfect alicorn foal and you're happy that you helped her fulfill this project. If she ever gets pregnant, you wondered if Celestia give birth to a princess or a prince. The addition of an 'actual' prince to the Royal Family sounds lovely and a change from the four Princesses that Equestria has gotten so accustomed to. Unlike Blueblood, he'll be a caring and selfless pony. Speaking of Blueblood, you smiled as you imagined him locked within a padded cell in the Heart Prison while pleading and crying for Celestia.

After going through a slimy passageway, the group arrived at the entrance to the ovary. You saw Celly insert her horn into a panel beside the door and entered a combination on the keypad. The translucent door whirred and opened, welcoming all to look at its content. The interior of the right ovary contained even more equipments. You saw large machines lined with buttons and levers. A few had monitors that displayed technical details beyond your understanding. A long table is covered with thick stacks of blueprints and diagrams with several microscopes lying about. The centerpiece of the chamber is a large sphere with a hue of color not unlike Celestia's mane.

"Before your eyes is the most precious thing in Celestia's possession: a specialized egg that awaits fertilization into the next alicorn to take the throne," Celly jumped excitedly, "This egg has all the positive traits of the Princess imprinted in its gene and imbued daily with magic to strengthen it. The idea for an heir came about after the Princess had a particularly bad meeting with some awful nobles who also happened to be Prince Blueblood's ancestors. She saw no saving grace in those ponies who might one day take the reins of the kingdom and use those powers to benefit themselves without putting the wellbeing of others into the picture. Thus Project Alicorn Heir was born. It has been ongoing for almost 600 years thanks to all the "volunteers" she received."

"Volunteers?" you tilted your head inquisitively.

"What she meant was her male harem during her estrus period. She's got thousands of them," Luna whispered while blushing.

"Okay...and what is this estrus I keep hearing about?"

"Nice to see you ask that, mage," Celly beamed, "The estrus cycle is a period during the year when mares emits pheromones from their privates and are extra receptive to stallions. Also colloquially known as "heat", the mare in heat will constantly think about mating a stallion to produce a foal. If a nearby male picks up the mare's scent, he will know that the mare is searching for a mate. He can either respond to this call or ignore it. If the pheromones are intense enough, it may cause the mind of a sound stallion to go into 'rutting mode' and make him go on an uncontrolled mating binge. Sometimes, a mare will find several stallions at once to 'help' them with their heats."

"And that's exactly what you did, sister?" Luna exclaimed as she points a hoof at Celly.

"Yep. Celestia recruited the entire Royal Guard to help with it. Virtually all guards for the last 500 years had done it at least once. Even Star Swirl the Bearded had his sample taken. Occasionally, some stallions from around Equestria will offer themselves for their Princess. And because of that I have in here a massive database of all of them including their samples."

Celly went over to a computer and conjured up a huge screen displaying pictures of all the stallions she extracted from.

"uhhhh...," Twilight groaned, "What database?"

The three of you looked at the purple alicorn still perched on the Moon Princess' back with horror as she shifted her eyes to the display.

"Uh oh" you all said together.

what I have done...? I rebelled at my own mentor out of jealousy, I'm a bad pony twilight rush to celestia embracing her in at hug as she cry repeating 'I'm sorry, I'm sorry!" again and again, Celestia warmly accepted the hug wrap her with her wings, this was a touching moments as luna let some tears, you smile at the two of them, you are happy that twilight didn't make a regretable action, you are glad for that.

111311111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1113111111111111111111111111.content:
You tried to process what you just heard. Of all things, is Princess Celestia seriously inviting you all to her teats? You're completely flabbergasted by the offer. It's an unprecedented offer but it sounds so wrong at the same time. Mares usually only showed their crotches to their foals or their partners for whatever kinky reasons they might have. Though human norms may have affected your perception of pony culture, to hear Princess Celestia herself so casually allowing a human to her most private part is totally unexpected. The princesses all stared at your nervous form, stifling laughter a among themselves.

"Hahaha... You should see the look on your face right now. It's priceless I tell you. It's as if you've seen my sister shaking her big plot for the first time," Princess Luna smirked.

The Night Princess's remark earned her a deadly glare from her big sister which caused the blue alicorn to shudder and stay silent.

"Come on, mage. There's nothing to be afraid about," Twilight giggled, "The teats will be fun, I promise."

-----
Celestia led the group once again. It took her less than 5 minutes before you all entered a large chamber with two circular lakes next to each other. Gleaming white milk filled both lakes to the brim while a large waterfall cascade down from an opening in the ceiling. A sweet scent permeated the air and filled your lungs with its alluring aroma. The teat is smaller than the womb although its still immense. The place is decorated like a resort complete with a large white and gold building and several swimming pools around the edge of the milk lake. There are also hoofball courses and volleyball nets at the far side.

A lot of the Royal White Cells you encountered early in Celestia's body are playing, swimming, and lounging on chairs. The Sun Princess explained that these body cells are off duty and given several days off for their hard work protecting her body. Upon seeing Celestia walking their way, the royal white cells all bowed in reverence of her. Without their armors, they look similar to Celly, the avatar, except for their aurora colored mane. You swore that a few of them eyed you lovingly and winked at you. You ignored them and continued with the group.

Celestia led the group to a bar beside the milk lake and sat down. The bar is a small wooden canopy with stools along a white marble counter.

"Ah, the memories. This place hasn't changed at all since I last came here as a filly. Celestia always took me here on weekends when I did a good job in class. I still remembered the taste of Celestia's milky sundaes and banana boats. They were one of the greatest treats I had in my life. The warm milk here always reminds me of my foalhood," Twilight reminisces.

A female server came and handed out menus for the four of you to look at. You scanned the menu and settled for a milk smoothie. Twilight and Luna chose the sundae while Celestia herself ordered plain milk.

A few minutes later, the waiter returned and served all of your respective orders. Twilight and Luna began eating their sundaes right away. Princess Celestia enjoyed a glass of her own milk with a contented smile plastered on her face. You looked at the tall glass of milk smoothie in front of you and felt wary as you eyes the frothy foam at the top.

"Is something wrong, mage?" Twilight asked. Her muzzle is coated with a ring of melted ice cream.

"Does the milk taste good?"

"Good? It's absolutely wonderful! The taste is better than any milk I've drank. Come on, give it a try," Luna encourages.

Your eyes fell back on the smoothie and remained there. You gathered your courage and took a little sip through the straw. What you tasted was unbelievable. An explosive sweet taste filled your mouth and teased your tongue. There are hints of hays and daffodils in the milk it they served to counterbalance the initial sweetness. In short, it was awesome! You quickly finished the smoothie and looked at the other princesses and saw that they have also finished their food. Celestia was the first to stand up and waited for the rest to do the same.

"Okay, I hope you all enjoyed your stay in my body. But sadly, our little stay in here will have to be cut short," Celestia said, "I have an important announcement to make and it will concern all of you, especially the mage. A dramatic political event is unfolding as we speak. Could you all please follow me to the meeting room at the resort building? There is a lot I need to explain."

11131111111111111111111111111.title: The Truth

111311111111111111111111111111.content:
Twilight blinked in confusion at Princess Celestia's weird order. How can this possibly help her or the shrunken human? And how is it gonna benefit us in the short run? Ever since Celestia told her about the imminent conflict between griffins and dragons, Twilight had been confused about her actions. It was as if her teacher was refraining from telling her the whole problem and leaving her out of the equation. Problem solving was one of Twilight's best abilities, an advantage that she could've used as a leverage for the Princess. Twilight was about to protest the Princess' decision when her eyes fall on her face. The sun goddess seemed to take notice of her protege's uncertain expression and craned her face closer.

"There isn't much time left, my faithful student," the alicorn said urgently, "The Gryphon King and the Dragons are waiting. Any further delays will spell war between them. I regret that things have to come down to this. Just trust me Twilight. Open your mouth."

"But Princess, I don't really don't understand the point of—"

Twilight was suddenly silenced as Celestia closed her mouth on her own and began kissing her passionately. The action came as a complete surprise for the purple pony. Twilight knew that Celestia love her as if she's her daughter. The two had many happy times together from her fillyhood to the day she was sent to Ponyville. But kissing out of the blue is not something that she would expect the Princess to do. Twilight tried to speak but was quickly subdued by Princess Celestia's large tongue as it finds its way into her orifice. With another powerful thrust from the Princess, she felt something being shoved down her throat. Twilight swallowed the object out of reflex before realizing that Celestia is transferring the human to her.

As if caught by a sudden spell, Twilight kissed back in a way she'd never imagined she would do. Oh my goodness, I'm kissing the Princess. I can believe this is happening. So strange yet soothing at the same time. All her thought began to melt away as she extended her tongue into the Princess. The temperature of her body started rising and her breathing accelerates. Celestia noticed this change and smiled as she took a more assertive position on the floor. She stroke Twilight gently behind her head and they looked at each other in the eye. Twilight saw love and care within Celestia's violet eyes. Those pools are filled with so much mysteries and wisdom that few could read yet the Princess' intention was clear at this moment. It was the moment she had been waiting for.

A few minutes of caressing and kissing later, Celestia and Twilight broke their contact. The Princess panted a little for the intensity of the kissing. The purple pony wasn't any better; she was sitting on the floor with a messy mane and blushing face.

"That was..." Twilight tried to say, "A sorta good sensation I was feeling."

"No need for the compliments. The endless torrents of suitors has allowed me to understand the different "techniques" in the last millennia."

"Okay..." Twilight said unsure whether to compliment that feat.

"Twilight Sparkle, I am counting on you to look after the human while I'm away. I hope you can do it to the best of your ability. You two had a lot of fun in me. I'm sure that it will be even better now you two are closer together," Celestia said with a wink.

"Princess?!" Twilight exclaimed while blushing.

"Hahaha. Just have you two. I shall be departing in the afternoon for the Gryphon Kingdom. I'll see what I can do about that."

With that, Princess Celestia left the bedroom and went for the throne room.

1113111111111111111111111111111.title: Inside Twilight Sparkle

11131111111111111111111111111111.content:
The morning came quickly for Twilight Sparkle after a dreamless night. Sunlight sifted through the window beside her comfortable bed and warmed her lavender coat. She was back in her library in Ponyville. When she got back home after a 3-hour train ride last night, she was bombarded with questions from her assistant dragon, Spike. She like how he was always concerned for her well-being. Ever since she hatched him at the test, Spike considered her a surrogate big sister and the two bonded strongly together. Twilight didn't want him to be too concerned about her and told him that it was simply royal business, nothing much to worry about. The princess was still wary about telling her friends about the mage living inside her.

No way to know how my friends would react. I don't want them jumping to conclusions like so many previous times. What if they think that he was a danger to me? Or think that I snapped again? Okay Twilight. There's no need to get worked up over this... Keeping his existence a secret will be the best way for now. Twilight thought.

On the other hoof, Twilight was also worried about how her mentor is faring so far. Princess Celestia is heading into an imminent conflict where both parties aren't too friendly with ponies. If things take a turn for the worse...

Twilight shook the thoughts out of head and helped herself out of the plush bed and headed down into the first floor of the library. I have to trust the Princess on this one. She knows what she's doing.

"Spike, could you get me to get some breakfast?"

"Right on, Twilight."
-----

You were awakened by the constant shaking of the bedroom. The shaking was intense enough for your body to be bouncing on the mattress. The sound of hoofsteps faintly echoed through the layers of organs and innards. Twilight is already up and going about her day. She's humming a little tune that you made out to be snippets from songs popular in Ponyville. Her voice is as sweet and lovely as Celestia's. you quietly listened to her songs as you tried to get a few extra minutes of sleep.

"Time to get up. The sun is up and shining!" Twilight said melodiously.

You opened your eyes and sat up.

"I'm up, okay?" you groaned.

"Did you sleep well, mage?"

"Sure did. I would say that your bed is as comfy as the one in Celestia."

"It's just some basic magic spells, nothing too special. Say, you wanna get some breakfast? Spike makes the most awesome oats and fried eggs."

"Who's Spike?" you asked.

"He's my assistant. You'll meet him shortly."

"Alright. Where should I be headed?"

"Same as the Princess. At my eyes. Be there in 10 minutes. We have a few things to go over."

111311111111111111111111111111111.title: Breakfast with Twilight

1113111111111111111111111111111111.content:
To say that Twilight's brain is vast would be a serious understatement. Predictably, it took the form of a large library. Twilight's nickname as the egghead princess isn't without reasons, you thought. If it weren't for the sign at the entrance marking it as the brain, you might have thought that you've stumbled upon some long lost archives in the basement of Canterlot Castle. You couldn't help but wonder how a pony, or in this case, a princess could dedicate themselves completely to organizing their brains into the firm of a library. The stadium-sized chamber has a huge dome shaped ceiling that depicts the constellations of the Equestrian sky. There are about five floors filled with tall bookshelves made of translucent bone cartilages. Upon them are tons of books neatly arranges based on sizes, colors, old/ new, and importance. Veins and wires are connected to the shelves, possibly to transfer information around. Signs at the end of each shelf are labelled with numbers and categories. As you made your way around, you looked at the contents available:

0001-0500: Fillyhood Memories
0501-0800: Adventures with My Friends
0801-1100: Princess Celestia's Lessons
1101-1500: Chemistry and Science
1501-1900: Equestrian History
1901-2100: Awkward Moments of My Life
2101-2500: Royal Etiquettes and Protocols
2501-3000: Humans and Their Customs
3001-3400: My Personal Thoughts
3401-3800: An Analysis of Pinkie Pie and Her Antics
3801-4000: The Mage
4001-4500: Restricted Materials (no colts/fillies allowed)
4501-5000: Classified: Equestrian Government NOFORN


You are amazed by the sheer number of choices available here and you only visited the first and second floor.

"Stunning, isn't it?" Twilight's voice said.

You whirled around and found yourself face-to-face with the purple alicorn, or a representation of her. She's wearing a blue shirt with a magenta bowtie and a pair of red glasses. Twilight looks adorable in this stereotypical librarian attire.

"I'm amazed! How did you manage to study all these stuffs, princess? And why is there a section dedicated to my information?"

"It's just years of organizing all the tidbits of info flying around in my head and a little of memorizing books I have in Golden Oaks Library down pat. As for your library section, I must say that I'm really interested in knowing more about you. So I've been making some notes since I met you in Princess Celestia."

"Well, I don't mind you doing research about me but you should ask for my consent the next time around. I'd really appreciate it if someone wants to experiment with me."

"Sorry. I'll make sure I inform you next time," Twilight offered with an adorkable smile.

"So what are we supposed to do here," you asked.

"Just follow me," the alicorn replied.

You walked behind Twilight as she led you to the atrium in the center. Oak desks and purple chairs emblazoned with her cutie marks circled a large marble statue of Princess Celestia on a pedestal. Around the pedestal are relief images of Twilight and her friends defeating various evils. You recognized Nightmare Moon, Discord, Queen Chrysalis, King Sombra and Tirek in the artwork.

"That's just a little way for me to memorialize the Princess and the adventures with my friends."

"Nice to hear that," you commented.

"Well, mage, the reason I get you here is for me to teach some history lessons. Since you were literally dragged into this, I think I need to give you some crash courses on the history of pony-dragon-griffon relations. It's gonna be so great!"

Oh no..., you thought, She's going bookworm mode again.

Why the long face? And do you have something against bookworms? Sheesh, you are just as impatient as Rainbow Dash, ya know. You just don't understand. Learning can be so awesome. Plus, I might even let you access the "Restricted Materials" section if you behave. And yes, I can telepathize my thoughts to you and vice versa. You're engulfed in my magic after all.

"Oh buck."

Pony-Dragon relations are neutral but we are allies with some different clans, like the Golden and Blue Dragonflight, and in contact with the Silver Drakes and the Cold Storm; an multi-colored dragon clan."

11131111111111111111111111111111111.title: A Very Long Lesson

111311111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Twilight?! " you blushed deeply, "What are you doing? Get those images out of my mind!!!"

"Heehaha," Twilight giggled, "That's just the preview of what's coming up, mage. My friends have a lot of things they prefer remain in their bedrooms. Just enjoy the stuffs I have, will you? Sooner or later, you'll have to learn a thing or two about pony anatomy and our little kinks. It'll greatly help you in the future."

Twilight said her last sentence with a quasi-seductive tone to it which made you blush deeper.

"Real subtle, Twilight, real subtle," you commented sarcastically, "Showing me "details" of other ponies. Are you trying to get me into a relationship with one of your friends? Lemme guess, you got the idea from a dating book."

"Hey!" Twilight exclaimed playfully, "Even though everyone considered me a bookworm, I don't blindly obey everything a book says. That's a serious misconception I want to clear up soon."

"Why clear up that misunderstanding? I think it's a cute idea of you! An adorkable princess is something Equestria seriously needs." you grinned.

"I have heard enough of those comments from my parents, brother, Celestia, Luna, and Cadence. I don't wanna add a human mage to that list. It's getting really annoying."

"See. Everypony concurred with my observation. You're cute when you do that."

"Rrrrrr.......I'll just pretend I didn't hear that lest you want ," Twilight gritted her teeth adorably, "This way to the "Restricted Materials" if you please."

"Why am I feeling that whatever you're showing will be particularly intense?" you asked absentmindedly.

"Oh yes it will be intense, mage. And you'll find out soon enough!" Twilight said with a slighting jarring smile.

You're taken aback by Twilight's expression and starting regret accepting her offer to show you her restricted materials.

After filing past several bookcases, the purple alicorn stopped at a door made from membranes. "Restricted Materials" is labeled in large, bold letters on it. A hole in the door indicates a horn identification system is in place; those are some of the safest forms of security made for ponies. Twilight conjured her magic, inserted her horn into the said hole, and tweaked a few spells, allowing you to enter the forbidden zone.

The restricted zone looks vastly different; it's a separate chamber in itself. Ambient lights dimly lit the carpeted floor with a few spotlights shining on the bookshelves. The shelves in the room is arranged in a circular form like the main library but on a much smaller scale. To your surprise and amusement, you also find several small reading rooms with a little bed and a nightstand where a visitor could enjoy the materials with more privacy.

"Like it?" Twilight grinned.

"Umm...yeah. It's nice and all but I don't know where I should start, frankly."

"Just pick whatever you want. You won't be disappointed."

You reached a shelf and random pulled out a book titled "The Princess' Catalog of Single Ponies". The title sounds like an interesting one to start with. You cracked open the book and began reading it. It's content is presented in a first pony view. You can see Twilight's muzzle and part of her mane in many of the photos. The subjects are mostly ponies of both genders from around the Ponyville area, though there are
also a few Canterlot nobles included. Captions on the photos identified the subjects with a list detailing their stamina, strengths and weaknesses, technique ratings, and Twilight's commentary. Several ponies got marked 'Practice needed' or 'Satisfactory' while others were labeled 'Recommended' and "Princess' Choice'. A few unlucky ponies were placed on a "Only Suitable as Friend" list, probably due to their personal beliefs or lack of experience. You browsed a few more pages of the book before returning it to the shelf.

The next book you picked is titled "The Friendship Collection". In this book, you find Twilight's friends engaging in pleasurable activities. Most of the acts are too intense for your is describe properly. A few mentionable examples include Applejack stuffing apples into her privates, Pinkie Pie posing seductively with balloons and streamers, Rainbow Dash having it her way with several Wonderbolts, Rarity indulging ecstatically on a diamond-encrusted 'toy', and Fluttershy asserting herself over a dragon several hundred times her size.

"Ummm...Did these actually happened or did you create these photos based on your imaginations?"

"It's a little of both...but I'm not at liberty to discuss the details. I Pinkie Promised my friends and breaking that promise will have dire consequences," Twilight said with a blush.

You randomly drew another book from the shelf as Twilight's face turned deep red at your choice. On the front cover, Shining Armor is depicted in full uniform pointing his "gun" toward you. The book was titled "The Strange Case of My Brother". You cracked open the cartilage book to view closeup photos of the white stallion doing lewd things with a pink alicorn you recognized as Princess Cadence. Several other pictures showed him using his magic to 'relief' several of the guards from his brigade while they're off duty.

"Man, these are intense stuffs, Twilight! Do you mind if I check some of these books out?"

"Absolutely not! I read these stuffs whenever I'm bored or in need of releasing some stress," Twilight beamed, "You can borrow them whenever you want. I'm a walking library after all."

"Thanks, Twi. I'd like to check out "The Friendship Collection" and "The Strange case of My Brother"."

"Absolutely. I'll get the books ready for you," she said as she went for the shelves.

You watched in amusement as Twilight shook her tail side by side when she retrieved the books you went and returned to you.

"Here you go, mage. Be sure to return them in 6 days or else I'm imposing a "late fee," the alicorn remarked playfully.

"I'll remember that."

Her purple eyes shimmered brightly and her muzzle smiled in the most adorable way possible.

13131.content:
You traveled up the tunnel fairly quickly; there is no reason to keep a lady waiting. There's a lot to explain to Rarity and you aren't even sure what kind of plan she has in store for you. The gradual upward spiral indicates that you're going in the right direction. Ironically, for a unicorn who wouldn't even come in contact with things she considered uncouth or dirty, the tunnel she opened for you sure is dark and slimy. By the time you reached the end of the tunnel, you are exhausted from climbing and crawling up the steep passage.

You rest for a minute before allowing your eyes to take in the new environment. In comparison to the organic feature of the stomach, this chamber looks a lot more plush and comfortable. The flooring is a marble-like material tinted a light shade of lavender. A large couch large enough to seat 3 to 4 ponies is placed against one side of the room. The wallpapers are simply a light gray with a thin stripe of inlaid gems. An ornate coffee table lie immediately in front of the couch. If it weren't for the fleshy doorway behind you, you might thought that this is somepony's comfy living room. Curiously, a pair of oval windows showed a bedroom and numerous pony mannequins with newly made dresses fitted onto them. You observed the exterior environment and deduced that it must be Rarity's bedroom. The ground rumbled and the scene outside started moving toward a dresser mirror and you spotted Rarity's reflection looking back at you. A careful look at her face revealed your location to be somewhere behind her eyes. The unicorn noticed you in the mirror and formed a faint smile.


"Ah. I see that you reached my head. Please take a seat on couch, dear."

"Yes, Miss Rarity," you replied and sat on the couch while still looking at the unicorn, "If I may ask, did you design this room yourself? It looks wonderful."

"Why yes, darling. Every little detail is made for a occupant to feel at home. I'm glad that you like it. Unlike one of my close friends who thought that it's too prissy."

"Okay, now what do we do, Miss Rarity?"

"Now dear. Would you like me to get some tea for you? It will probably ease you into conversation."

"Thank you, Miss Rarity. But I wouldn't want to ask too much of you. I appreciate the offer."

"That just nonsense, mage. You really have to taste this new blend that I just got from the department store in Manehatten. You don't have to be so uptight here. We're in Ponyville, not some noble banquet in Canterlot. Please make yourself comfortable."

You saw here pour two cup of tea from a pot that she has set on another table in the room. Using her magic, she shrinks one of the cup and made it appeared on the coffee table in front of you. You took a light sip and found it to be one of the tastiest tea you had in a while.

"I do believe that there is some ways we can come to an agreement about fulfilling your fantasy and maintaining my privacy."

1313111.content:
An enormous pink mass stretched out before me, filling my horizon. I felt insignificant next to it, yet curious what was going to happen next. Curiosity overcame me and i reached out and touched the mass. Suddenly images filled my head in rapid succession. I saw Rarity smiling, I saw a group of other colored ponies and a baby dragon, then flashes of their journies and struggles. Next I could see Rarity hard at work on her dresses, all the numerous designs that encircled her head, from the simple to the impossibly elaborate, and the hard yet joyful process of her trying to bring these to life. The images stopped and I felt momentarily dazed, though I think I now knew more about this pony before me. She was ambitious and a hard worker, but cared deeply for her friends.

I could suddenly hear her voice again.

I hope you didn't mind that, I just thought it was the fastest way to introduce myself. I could somehow feel her smiling.I also thought it would do well to prepare you.

"Not at all Miss Rairty. And for what are you preparing me?"

Please, you can call me Rarity. As for what I'm preparing you for.. well my day of course! You will be able to feel what I feel, and I might even let you watch. You can even browse some of my memories if you wish to learn more abotu me. Though I have sectioned off... certain sections. Do not cross those boundaries or you will regret. A chill ran through me.

"I understand. You are very generous, Rarity."

I could hear gentle laughter.

"I get that a lot. But you know, I always do my work alone, having someone to talk to and bounce idea off of might be an interesting change of pace. You can even see my thoughts if I so choose."

The outlines of several different dresses appeared, then I saw her face smiling back at me. She must have practiced this.

Of course you are not my prisoner. Anytime you wish to leave or move elsewhere, please do not let me know.

"Thank you Rarity."

I thought about what I wanted to do next

The Reproductive Organ sounds like a good place to start. The pink flesh is virtually every where save for a red-green catwalk your on. The smell of musk permeates the air in here. Normally such smells would offend your nostrils. It reminds you of the intense odor lingering around Ponyville during those periods and mentally gagged at it. The ponies there find it a rather normal, even agreeable, occurrence; a natural process. Unfortunately for a human mage like you, it's unbearable. You recalled some mares teasing you for not knowing the significance of the estrus cycle and lacking some of the perks of being an equine. But Big Mac's is subtly different. It's a strangely soothing aroma with a hint of apple.

Your eyes turned wide in amazement as your mind slowing processed what you're seeing. Standing proud and tall in the center of the chamber is the towering edifice of Big Mac's stallionhood. It is currently fully retracted into the sheath, extending all the way toward the ceiling like a spear ready to fire out at any time. 1422322111111.title: Big Mac's Explanation and Revelation

14223221111111.content:
"It probably best to listen to your sister, Big Mac," you said, "I think she has a better plan for us two. I'll go with Applejack while you hide out. Man, those injuries to your testicles look really nasty."

Big Mac looked sadly at his sheath and groin and gave a weak nod in acknowledgement.

"If Rainbow finds you again, who knows what she'll do then. I'd hate to see her wrecking your stallionhood for good. You got to hide somewhere safer this time. I think the apple cellar would be a good place."

"That's out of the question," the red pony said bluntly, "You may not know it but Dash loves cider more than anything else. She drinks several mugs of the stuff in one sitting and will fight over every last drop. And when she's drunk, Dash tend to do crazy things without really using her head. Our farm got more than a dozen barrels of ciders in that cellar. The last place I wanna be is somewhere she can have her cider to go with her heat and rut me till she's out cold."

"Whelp! So we have a cider-addicted pegasus with an out of control heat. Rainbow's got more problems than I previously thought," you remarked dejectedly.

"And that's just the start of it," Big Mac added.

"....Okay, let's worry about that later. We've got to resolve the matters at hand. Namely, getting me over to Applejack and finding you a safe place. Any ideas how to transfer me to your sister?"

"Hmm...I can ask her for an opinion."

Big Mac informed Applejack about your choice and asked her how she planned to get to over to her body. Additionally, he asked her if she knew any good hiding place on the farm.

You can see Applejack putting a hoof under her chin.

"Hmmmmm. That's a bummer," she said with a scrunched face.

There something adorable about her doing that pose. Perhaps it's the way she fidget with her hoofs. You began to admire her the longer you studied her features. Her mane, hat, coat, well-toned body, freckles, and her cutie mark all worked flawlessly together to create this beautiful mare.

Once in a while, her green eyes will brighten at any ideas that comes her way. Unfortunately, all of them were shot down with a resounding "Eeeenope" from Big Mac. He didn't want to endure anything that involves his. You sit quietly in the eyeballs as the siblings went back and forth with various plans to get you out. Until finally, Applejack just heaved a sigh.

"Ah guess this is where my Elemental power comes into play," she said.

Both you and Big Mac 'huh' in confusion at the same time.

"You see, Twilight's been explaining to us element bearers the secret powers that's contained within our amulets. Interestingly, we can access those power without even wearing the gems. And it only gets weirder from there. Twilight's must've been researching all those thick books she's been carrying around all the time. Gotta admire her studiousness."

"And what does that have to do with our problem, sis?"

"Don't you see? Twilight said that each of the element granted a specific power to each of us. I can use this power to our advantage and get you two safe and sound."

"I'm still a little wary about them magical stuffs. You sure you know what you're doing?"

"...Ah guess it's better for me to show than tell," Applejack smiled, "You ready there, sugarcube?"

Big Mac reluctantly nodded along with you.

"Here it comes," she warned as her eyes started glow white.

Even in Big Mac's body, you can sense the intense power of magic emanating from the Earth Pony. It was shocking that a non-unicorn could so effectively casts a spell. But it's more plausible when you consider the fact that she possesses the most powerful artifact in Equestria: The Elements of Harmony. A tingling sensation spread throughout your body, numbing your arms and legs. Your surrounding started distorting as Applejack continued channeling her power into her brother. You started losing your consciousness as a pulling force dragged you through an empty void...

Some times later

You slowly regained your senses although everything is still a blur. What a ride!, you thought. Mustering your strength, you sit up and looked around. You're relieved to see the sight of the farm and orchards; Applejack didn't disintegrate you like Nightmare Moon. Next to you to the groaning figure of Big Mac all curled up like a ball. He is now at roughly the correct size ratio with you. Wait, does this mean the elements has turned you back to normal? That brief elation was squashed when you looked up and saw Applejack's huge face towering over you. In fact, you are resting upon the mare's hoof. Her face cracked into a big smile when she noticed that you're awake.

"Howdy y'all," her voice thundered, "You two alright?"

"I'm fine but that's not what I'm worried about. How's Big-"

A loud high-pitched scream penetrated the air, stunning your ears. You turned toward the source of the sound and saw Big Mac with eyes like pinpricks looking at his sister with fear.

"Applejack, what did you so to me?!!" he blurted.

"Whoa, nelly. Ya gotta calm down there, big brother."

"Calm? How am I supposed to keep calm when I'm smaller than an apple? I'm the same size as the mage now," Big Mac exclaimed.

"Listen," Applejack stated calmly, "Twilight told me my element's secret power is replicating a cast spell in my vicinity. It means that I can copy the effects of a spell and recast it on a new target of my choice without any prior knowledge of the spell in question. At least that's the way the bookworm puts it."

"Okay, but how am I gonna hide now? I can't do nothing at this size. I won't be hiding in the cellar, barn, clubhouse or even my room," his voice still sounds panicked.

"Oh ya silly. You won't be hiding in those places; you be hiding in me," Applejack said, tapping her hoof on her chest for emphasis, "Ah'm the safest option you got here."

"...."

"A place where you don't have to worry about being discovered by Rainbow or any other mares. A place where there's the warmth of family. And a place where I can always keep an eye on my big brother and make sure he's safe."

Applejack leveled her hoof to her mouth and tilted it, allowing the fearful stallion and you to slide toward her throat.

Don't worry, big brother. You are in good hoofs," the mare said in a strangely motherly tone.

142232211111111.title: Apples to the "Core"

1422322111111111.content:
Rainbow Dash quietly sat down beside Applejack, her face still stained with tear marks that glistened in the sunlight. She sniffed a few times as she focused her attention on the farm pony beside her. Although Dash tried her best to look calm and collected, those cerise eyes of hers proved otherwise. They were filled with regret and melancholy deep within.

"I... I don't understand. What is there to talk about? The damage has already been done. I rutted your brother like a mare on her first heat. I guess you and your brother will have a hard time ever forgiving me," she said dejectedly while eyeing Applejack.

The looks on the pegasus' face made Applejack hesitate to share what she's been hiding for so long; she couldn't bring herself to tell Rainbow about her infertility and break her fragile psyche any further. The orange mare imagined the various ways that Rainbow would react to the news and none of them sounds good. But Applejack reminded herself that she can't hide the truth forever. She could delay it for a day, weeks, months, or even years but sooner or later, it'll have to come out. Telling Dash right now is her best option. Honesty is her element and she will do what's needed to uphold that. Closing her eyes calmly, Applejack took a deep breath and heaved a long sigh. This is for your own good, Rainbow., she thought.

"Sugarcube, did you remember the last time you went to the hospital 'cause of that flying stunt you were performing?"

"Uh...yeah. That's the Canterlot Aerial Show about a year or two ago. I ended up flying way too fast and crashed rump-first through the wall and landed in The Princess's room. That was the most awful injury I did to my rump. My backside felt shattered. It took about two weeks before I could sit down or use the restroom.... So why would you ask this?"

"Well, sugarcube, that's the problem," Applejack replied composedly.

"Wait, no. I'm perfectly fine. Didn't the doctor told me that I was up and flying sooner than he expected.? He even told me that my marehood is all fine."

Applejack cringed at the last sentence. She knew how hard this is going to be for the cerulean mare. The only thing she wished for was that Dash could somehow accept it. Applejack mentally gulped and prepared for the worst.

"Rainbow," Applejack said firmly, "While we're in the hospital, the girls told you that there's nothing for you to worry about your body, right?"

Rainbow only nodded.

"I'm afraid that we weren't exactly honest with you."

"....huh?"

"It's time for you to hear what went down at the hospital that day," Applejack stammered.

"...What really happened?" Rainbow pressed.

Applejack paused for a moment to collect her thoughts and put the story in a way the Pegasus could understand. She heaved another sigh before she continued.

"It was almost midnight at your second day at the hospital. The girls are all gathered at the doctor's office to hear about your condition. when the doctor came in, that thick folder he had in his hoof told us something was wrong. I mostly understand the situation through Twilight's translation of those difficult terms. The doctor told us that crash you had directly impacted your uterus and ovaries, causing the awful pain you were feeling. That wasn't only some nasty bruises you got then. The doc showed us an X-ray photo of tears in your Fallopian tubes which connects your ovaries to your womb. The uterus also showed signs of trauma in multiple areas. It was just bad. I couldn't bring myself to hear the rest of the doctor's explanation."

Rainbow look at Applejack who was on the brink of crying.

"..Wha...what does that mean for me then?" she said fearfully.

"The doctor said that those wounds would heal but there would be long term damages to you reproductive ability. Meaning that you.....," Applejack broke down and leaned against Rainbow."

"That I'm what?! Tell me AJ! Just bucking tell me!!!" The pegasus said frantically.

".........Rainbow...you won't be able to have foals anymore."

The revelation felt like a lightning strike for Rainbow Dash. Every single muscle on her body can to a standstill. Her wings fell limp to the sides as her mind threatened to shut down completely. Applejack could see the wide-eyed, dazed expression on the mare's face through her blurry eyes.

"no.....no.........NOOOO!!! This can't be happening! It's all just a joke, right? Tell me Applejack, please tell me this is a joke."

"I'm sorry sugarcube," Applejack said sadly, "but that's the honest truth."

Rainbow Dash looked up at Applejack to find her gazing back at her with remorse. In those emerald eyes, she saw her own face looking back at her with the same lost expression. Her multi-colored mane is completely disheveled and her own eyes red from crying.
------

1422322112111.content:
The multi-colored curtains lifted to reveal Rainbow Dash herself in a more suggestive version of the Wonderbolts' uniform. The blue spandex suit fits snugly to her solid body, an aerodynamic design to increase the efficiency in flight. The back portion of the uniform has been cut away in order to reveal her well-toned muscles and her rounded flank. She's exactly the athletic and proud Wonderbolt recruit that everyone who met her described her as. Unfortunately, those ponies and humans have no idea that their favorite idol also has a shadier side when it comes to her heat. The pony seems to notice the attention you're giving her and batted her eyes slowly at you. You are so stunned at her beauty that you momentarily forgot how you got here and the fact that you're restrained by some tentacles. If it weren't for the fact that you got here unwillingly, you'd enjoy the most of this 'show.' I'd hate to admit this but Dash sure is beautiful, you thought, Wait... Damn it! Get yourself together! Now is not the time to let my mind take its course. I gotta figure a way to get out this place before Dash makes me her first human target. The feeling of the restraints tightening around your waist that brought your attention back to the present. The pain forced your eyes to return to the stage where a platform lifted Rainbow Dash onto the higher level of the stage. She gave you a mischievous wink before donning her flight goggles. The lights around the bar dimmed to the color of faint ember as limelight on the stage focused on Dash's little dance. This is gonna get really bad...

Slow tempo-ed kinky music wafted toward your ears from the ceiling as the pegasus suggestively danced upon an artificial cloud prop. The pony rubbed her flank against the surface of it causing miniature lightnings and thunders to form against her flank. It's apparent that the lightning is electrocuting her in the place she wants, if the pleasurable on her face is any indication. The electricity had the effect of temporarily straightening her messy mane as she groaned suggestively. Dash intensified the speed of her rubbing. Her moaning grew deeper and fast until a loud thunder finally cracked and the miniature cloud unleashed torrential rains unto the stage. The sound Dash made sends shivers done your spine as dozens of questions are running through your head. What... the buck did I just see? How is it even possible for a pegasus to pleasure herself with a cloud? Don't lightnings kill? And did she actually DO that on random clouds in Ponyville? The next time it rains, you really hope that what's raining down from above is actually water and not something else entirely. This really proves your former teacher's adage that some things are better left unknown.

After that part, the mare spread her wings and took off into the air. Dash started performing her own style of aerobatic flying around the stage. Many of the moves are ones you are familiar with from the countless "Wonderbolts Equestrian Tour" you had seen when your younger. It brought back some good memories from the depths of your mind. The one Dash is performing for you has more 'fancy' additions to it like flashing her privates at you, making out the contour of a heart with her rainbow trail, and pyrotechnics added for a good measure of drama. You don't know why but the way Dash is dancing is starting to have an effect on you. The complex mix of emotions you are feeling started to unsettle you. You seriously wanted to take your eyes off the show before you but you can't. There's so much internal conflict going on. A part of you is afraid of what will happen next. Yet another part seems to anticipate or even like it. It's literally fear clashing with your innermost want. Within a few minutes, Rainbow Dash ended the show with a sonic rainboom as she dropped down right in front of you. Her wings flared wide open as her rose-colored eyes focused on you.

"Hi, there," Dash said gently, "Welcome to "The Rainboom" where all sorts of needs get fulfilled. I'm Rainbow Dash but you probably already knew that."

You are wordless as the mare continued talking with her trademark smirk.

"We don't usually get human guests in here! What can I do for you, little guy?"

"......."

"Come on," Dash dragged impatiently, "There gotta be something you could asked the favor of...Right, perhaps I need to loosen up the tentacles to make you more comfortable."

You felt the tentacles on you limbs and waist loosening and dissolving away back into the walls. You shot a glare at Rainbow Dash.

"Ommph!"

"Oh thank goodness... Rainbow, what the buck were you thinking! You almost strangled me in that... passionate display of your techniques," you said with a hint of frustration, "Care to explain about that little thing?"

"Well...What did you expect? This is a Stallion's Club! I was just trying to show you some of my awesome moves here. If you want to take it a step further, I could gladly accommodate that. Never thought that I would perform to a human though," Dash said as matter-of-factly.

"Hey! I never asked that you tie me up and watch you act. And just to get the message through: I'm not interested in this at all."

"Then why are you here then? You don't just walk in here without knowing what's gonna happen?" Dash asked as she crossed her arms, "And that also raises the question, who are exactly and what's your purpose here? You aren't a changeling, are you?

Dash narrowed her eyes at you in suspicion.

"No. I'm a mage and I...I was accidentally sent in here when you, or the real you, is have your little "fun time" with Big Mac.," you said as you glared daggers.

"That only partly answered my question," Dash commented, "But what in the hay are you doing in him?"

"I was experimenting with my shrinking spell and I was living with Big Mac to understand a little more about pony anatomy. He was telling me about your heat-driven exploits on him when you came and did your thing. Look at what you did to the poor stallion. He'll probably hide in the barn for weeks because of you," you exclaimed.

"Oh...Everything has been getting worse for her these few months. This isn't entirely my fault," Dash said with a tinge of sadness.

"Not your fault? How could you say that screwing Big Mac is not your fault?!"

"Look, human...," the pegasus said affirmatively, "I may look like Rainbow Dash but I'm not actually her. I am one of the many cells that sustain the pony herself. For some reasons, we are all identical to her, save for the fact that there are also male versions of her lurking around. We are all divided into sections and assigned different duties around the body. I happened to be in the "Fantasy Fulfillment" department, charged with intensifying whatever kinky thoughts she might have. If Dash has been acting real weird lately, you should bring the issue to the guys and gals at the "Estrus Management" and "Self-Control" Department. If they won't help you, get the "Flight" Department to help you out by disabling her wings."

Does this pony has more department than the Canterlot bureaucracy?, you thought.

"How do I verify if this is true, Rainbow, if I may call you that? The departments sounds awfully uncooperative if you ask me."

"It's even worse. The department are extremely competitive with one another for recognition as the best. They just can't seem to agree on one goal for the future. It causes imbalances in Dash's stamina. For example, she's sometimes more active than Pinkie Pie on sugar. At other time, she's sleeping off for days at times. As for her recent heat problem, I figure it might be something similar going on there. I brought the issue of non-cooperation to the heads of various department. But they all write me off as weak, non-competitive, and most likely to have her flanks kicked in the face of danger. I guess I'm the only dissenting voice in this whole body."

"Is there anyway I can help?"

"You can try if you want, but I don't think it's gonna change things much. The other cells rejected my complaints. What makes you think that they will listen to an 'outsider' human? They'll call the "White Cells" squad to get you...Okay, I'll be off my work shift in ten minutes. Maybe I could take you to my place in Dashville to get things worked out. The town's only a few tunnels up the spine."

"There's a town in here?" you gasped.

"Yup. And a beautiful one at that. Friendly ponies and loving families everywhere. All copies of Rainbow Dash. You'll fall in love with it at the first sight. I promise you!"

"You gotta be kidding me..."
